loans.name: Blanca Sonia

texts.es:
Blanca, requiere de un nuevo crédito por  la facilidad que le dan de ir mejorando su venta de tortillas, podrá comprar maíz, cal, leña y gas propano, así seguirá trabajando y satisfaciendo a sus clientes.
Con los financiamientos anteriores se ha mantenido trabajando y siendo un apoyo para que sus hijos sigan estudiando y logren convertirse en profesionales.
texts.en: Blanca needs a new loan for the ease that it provides to improve her tortilla sales. She will buy corn, firewood, lime, and propane gas, in this way she will continue working and satisfying her customers. With the previous financing she has continue working and being a support so that her children continue attending school and being able to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, lime, and propane gas, in this way she will continue working and satisfying her customers.

loans.name: Tuğba

texts.en:
Tuba is married and the mother of a one-year-old. When her husband’s job was going poorly, she decided to make cookies and cakes to help support him. She liked baking and entered the business sector because she enjoyed the work. She advertised her products by word of mouth, on the internet and by visiting businesses in the market one by one.  

She now makes and sells cookies for three businesses, three days a week. In addition, she makes cakes-to-order for birthdays and special occasions.  

She’ll use the loan to buy new cake pans and the ingredients for dough. Her dream is to open a a store herself in the future.

loans.use: to buy new cake pans and ingredients.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita and her son live in Darbas village in the Syunik region. Rita is a skilled farmer, with many years of experience in running a farm. On her farm, she keeps livestock of 20 cows, eight calves, five piglets and hens. On the plot of land near her house, Rita also cultivates wheat, potato and emmer wheat both as forage for the livestock and for family use.  Rita perfectly manages to run her farm successfully, with the big support of her son.
 
Now, aiming to boost her farm's productivity, Rita needs some funds. She asks lenders to support her with purchasing milking aggregate and forage for feeding the livestock. This is her second loan. The initial loan from another local financial institution was very hard for Rita to return back, because of many financial instabilities. However, thanks to her hard work during the recent times, Rita was able to run her agribusiness in a sustainable way, ensuring that she will be able to cover the monthly payments. So, she has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second-chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for milking aggregate for the farm and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Tamara

texts.en:
The woman in the photo is Tamara, a 52-year-old farmer from Arevashogh village. She lives there with her husband and 19-year-old daughter. 
Tamara and her husband have been running farm since they got married. The farm includes three cows, hens and four calves. Tamara also cultivates wheat and potato both for family use and for sale.  
To develop her farm and enlarge her number of cattle, Tamara has applied for this loan. She plans to purchase five piglets and two calves. This is her first loan, so it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products before, because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for five piglets and two calves.

loans.name: Bejan

texts.en:
Bejan is 34 years old, and is from village of Ingiri. His family was exiled after the war, and the family members now get assistance from the local government. This is the only source of income for the four-member family. They belong to the subsistence poor category, as they have no source of significant income and live in poverty.  

Due to the aforementioned situation, Bejan lacks access to capital markets and financial institutions to obtain credit for starting a business, as they require stable income and business experience. The Start Up program, created by Kiva and Credo, enabled him to get a loan of 1,000 USD to start his own business. 

Bejan plans to purchase all the equipment and tools needed to open a vehicle repair service business. He has already found a place for his new business and will rent it. The business will be profitable he thinks, and it will make significant income for this poor family. 

Bejan will meet all daily costs and will create financial stability for his family members. He awaits your support and kindness.

loans.use: to open a vehicle repair service business.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
For about three years, David has been running a food market in Vanadzor town. Being the only breadwinner for the household, David was working day-and-night to make the ends meet. He lives with his wife and little daughter. 
All his earnings go to cover his kids’ daily expenses, utility expenses, food expenses and other necessary ones to provide the minimum living conditions for the family. Despite many difficulties, David manages to run his market successfully and fill it with necessary products for the customers. 
Now, aiming to boost his business, David asks for this loan. He plans to purchase new food supplies for the store. 
This is his second loan. David, because of financial difficulties, wasn't able to repay his first loan on time to the local financial institution, so he has now been approved for a loan within the framework of joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second-chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for new food supplies for the store.

loans.name: Vincent's Group

texts.en:
Vincent, a 68-year-old proud father of six, is often described as a very hardworking individual. A group leader, he is representing his group of six farmers in Kakamega North District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2014, Vincent has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Vincent described his harvest as very good last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Vincent’s Group will be able to plant a total of 3.5 acres of land and purchase a total of three solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his motorcycle that he uses to sell bread.

loans.name: Deni

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of the Ruma agents, Deni. Deni lives in East Bandung, a semi-urban area located about three hours' drive from Jakarta. Deni is happily married. Together with his wife, they have a very cute six-year-old daughter. 

Deni owns a stall that sells mobile airtime credits and provides bill payment services for his community. It has been almost a year since he joined Ruma. He learned about Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive who came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he was interested in Ruma’s system; the sales executive will be coming to his stall to collect the money. Moreover, his community sees him as a friendly and informative mobile airtime credit provider.

As the business grows, Deni is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to process more mobile airtime credits and bill payment services to his community. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Deni improve his business and accordingly, his community, which needs access to such services.  

Deni’s goal in the near future is to serve as an e-commerce business for his customers. As seen in the photo, Deni is the one who is standing and smiling in his own stall. He will be very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to purchase more prepaid airtime credits to sell to community members who want to use mobile phones to connect with their loved ones.

loans.name: Juan De Dios

texts.es:
Juan, de 33 años de edad, está acompañado, estudio hasta séptimo grado y tiene 2 hijos.

Juan, se levantaba a las 4:00 de la mañana para irse al trabajo, salía a las 11 de la mañana y solo llegaba a la casa a cambiarse de ropa para ir a la escuela.- El trabajo para él no ha cambiado, siempre se dedica a cultivar maíz y frijol; también ayuda en la finca a sus vecinos.

El dinero del crédito lo necesita para comprar harinilla para darle de comer a los cerdos que tiene, de esa manera los engordará más rápido y los venderá; siempre ha criado cerdos, para tener ingresos y así cubrir sus necesidades.

Su mayor sueño es, que sus hijos sean profesionales y que no hagan el mismo trabajo que él hace, pues es muy pesado.- También sueña con hacer más grande su casa de habitación, y darle una mejor comodidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Juan is 33 years old, he has a partner, he studied until the seventh grade and has two children.

He gets up at 4 in the morning to go to work, leaving at 11 in the morning, and only going home to change clothes to go to school. His work has not changed, he always works growing corn and beans. He also helps on his neighbour's plantation.

He needs the money from the loan to buy harinilla (a type of corn meal) to feed the pigs he owns, to fatten them more quickly and sell them. Juan has always raised pigs, to gain income and cover his needs.

His greatest dream is that his children become professionals and that they do not do the same work that he does, as it is very tiresome. He also dreams of making his house bigger and giving more comfort to his family.

loans.use: to buy harinilla (a type of corn meal) to feed the pigs he owns.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to study technical studies and specialize in graphic design.

loans.name: Szikron

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of the Ruma's agents, Szikron. Szikron lives in Pekalongan, a city located in Central Java, around two hours from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia, by plane. Szikron lives there with his wife and his three daughters. He owns a stall that sells mobile phone accessories and mobile airtime credits for his community. He has already been part of Ruma for almost a year, and he knew Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive, who came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he already heard before that Ruma has the best service and system.

His community sees Szikron as a trusted mobile provider. As the business grows, Szikron is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to process more mobile airtime credits to his community, so that people in his community can easily connect with their loved ones, no matter how far they are apart. Besides, from their personal perspective, Szikron and his wife realized that they have to save some money for their daughters’ education. 

Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Szikron improve his business (and if the business has been improved, it will be easier for Szikron and his wife to save more money for their daughters’ education), and accordingly, his community, which needs access to such services.  

Szikron’s goal with Ruma in the near future is to serve as an e-commerce business for his customers. As seen in the photo, Szikron is the one who is sitting in his own stall. He will be very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to purchase more prepaid airtime credits to sell to community members who want to use mobile phones to connect with their loved ones.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose es un hombre de 40 años de edad, casado, tiene 3 hijos de 16, 13 y 11 años,  y su negocio es la carpintería. 
Él es emprendedor, independiente, constante, paciente, generoso, responsable y trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Chijini pampa’ un área recientemente urbanizada, dónde antiguamente se pastoreaba ovejas, algunos pobladores continúan criando ovejas pero en menor número, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 0-12 grados centígrados.
Jose es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Aymara que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. su vida la comparte con su esposa que trabaja vendiendo comida y con sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la fabricación de muebles de madera, como; puertas, ventanas, muebles de cocina y otros, actividad que realiza en su taller ubicado en su misma casa y la venta la realiza ambulantemente en las ferias. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes fijos como constructores que le piden puertas por cantidad y también cuenta con clientes casuales, la desventaja es el transporte de sus puertas, porque no tiene auto y tiene que alquilar camionetas o taxi. “inicié este oficio desde muy joven como ayudante, luego me independicé y los clientes antiguos se fueron conmigo…” comenta. Su sueño es contar con un taller más grande y con una tienda para exponer sus trabajos, él desea realizar la compra de madera por mayor para trabajar constantemente y pagar los gastos de sus 3 hijas. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 11 años que se dedica a esta actividad de forma independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Jose solicita un préstamo para la compra de madera para fabricar muebles y ayudar con los gastos escolares de sus 3 hijas.
texts.en:
Jose is a 40 year old man. He is married and has 3 children, aged 16, 13 and 11. His business is carpentry. He is enterprising, independent, stable, patient, generous, responsible and hardworking. He runs his business is the ‘Chijini Pampa’ area, it is a recently developed area where they used to be grazing sheep. Some of the residents still raise sheep but in smaller numbers. It has a dry, cool climate with a temperature that varies between 0-12 degrees celsius. 

Jose has dark skin, short black hair, brown eyes, short stature, and a medium build. His mother tongue is Aymara, which he speaks with his family. He speaks Spanish in the general culture and for his business. He shares his life with his wife, who sells food, and his children, who go to school. They live in a house they own, made of bricks and cement with a sheet metal roof. It has potable water, electricity and plumbing. His business is making wood furniture, such as doors, windows, kitchen furniture and more. He does this in his workshop located in his house and he sells as a street vendor in markets. The advantage of his business is that he has regular customers such as builders who order doors from him in quantities and also new customers. The disadvantage is the transport of his doors, because he doesn't have a car and he has to rent trucks or taxis.“I started this business from the time he was very young as an assistant. Later I went off on my own and the old customers went with me…” he says. His dream is to have a bigger shop and a store to display his products. He wants to buy wood wholesale to work constantly and pay for his 3 daughters' expenses. This is his second loan cycle with the institution in the 11 years that he has been doing this work on his own.  

These are the reasons that Jose is asking for a loan to buy wood to make furniture and help with his 3 daughters' education expenses.

loans.use: to buy wood to make furniture and help with his 3 daughters' education expenses.

loans.name: Las Guerreras De Satipo Group

texts.es:
Yolanda  tiene 30 años soltera con dos hijos que aún están en la escuela. Yolanda siempre le gusto el negocio años atrás tenía un pequeño restaurante y es así donde implementa  una pequeña bodega en su vivienda para poder brindarles una buena calidad de vida a sus dos hijos. Una de sus metas de Yolanda es ver que su negocio crezca y pueda abrir un minimarket. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de más mercadería de abarrotes. Yolanda viste un polo color fucsia. 
Agradece a los inversionista Kiva por confiar en ella
texts.en:
Yolanda is 30 years old, single, and has two children who are in school. She has always enjoyed being in business. Years ago she had a small restaurant, but then she opened a small store in her home so that she could provide a good quality of life for her two children. One of Yolanda’s goals is to see her business grow and eventually open a mini-market.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of more grocery merchandise. In the photo, Yolanda is wearing a fuchsia shirt. She appreciates the Kiva lenders for trusting her.

loans.use: to buy grocery merchandise.

loans.name: Jovenes Ecologistas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “JOVENES ECOLOGISTAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Celia ella es soltera y tiene 48 años y tiene 4 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de restaurant, la socia realiza diferentes platos como pollo al horno, sopas y saltados de carne, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, verduras y pollo.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The lending club “JOVENES ECOLOGISTAS” is located in the Santa Ana district in La Convencion province, in the department of Cusco.

Celia, 48, is single and has 4 children. She works in her restaurant where she makes dishes like baked chicken, soups, and beef stir fry. She works from 8am to 6pm. She's been running this business for 8 years and its going very well. Her dream is to have a restaurant.

Other lending club members have business including animal sales, clothing sales, a grocery store, and food sales. The loan recipient is grateful to everyone who is part of her dream through this project and promises to make her payments on the established time frame.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients like rice, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en:
Mariam is a married mother of one child who attends school. She lives at her own house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

For the past ten years, she has operated a clothes selling business, selling from door-to-door to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of high cost of transportation. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan that she is requesting of 30,000 KES, she wants to purchase bales of clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Vilen

texts.en:
Vilen lives with his big family in Kapan city in the Syunik region. Vilen is married and he has two boys.  His parents and brother also live with him. Vilen used to work as a locksmith and then as a welder at the city combine. Now he is busy only with poultry and fish breeding, which he established five years ago. He keeps his chickens in a barn near his house and in front of his house he built a pool where he breeds fish. Vilen has a lot of customers around the entire region; these are the owners of food markets, restaurants and cafés who give big orders to him for both poultry and fish purchases. Among the citizens, Vilen also has a lot of regular customers. 

This loan of 700,000 Armenian drams Vilen asks for because he wants to build a bigger barn for his chickens and to buy young fish to develop his fish breeding business.

loans.use: to build a bigger barn for his chickens and buy young fish to develop his fish breeding business

loans.name: Ariana

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of the Ruma agents, Ariana. Ariana lives in East Bandung, a semi-urban area located about a three-hour drive from Jakarta. Ariana owns a stall that sells mobile phone accessories and mobile airtime credits and provides bill payment services for his community. He decided to join Ruma because he is interested in Ruma’s system; the sales executive will be coming to his stall to collect the money. Moreover, his community sees him as a friendly and informative mobile provider.

As the business grows, Ariana is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to process more mobile airtime credits and bill payment services to his communities. Knowing about its importance, your loan will be very useful to help Ariana improve his business and, accordingly, his community who needs access to such services. Ariana’s goal with Ruma in the near future is to serve from an e-commerce business for his customers, the latest Ruma product called ‘Mapan’. As seen in the photo, Ariana is the one who is sitting in his own stall. He will be very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to help him improve his business selling mobile airtime credits and give his community better access to communication and financial services.

loans.name: William Alexander

texts.es:
Willian, de 29 años de edad, solo estudio hasta tercer grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, tienen una hija de 5 años de edad.

Wilian, no tiene ningún tipo de negocio, pero se dedica a la agricultura desde hace más de diez años, el trabajo lo aprendió con su padre, que desde muy pequeño le enseño a trabajar muy fuerte, los cultivos los tiene a una distancia de 1 kilómetro y el horario de trabajo es de 6:00 a.m. a 12:00 m.d.

Con el crédito comprará abono, pesticidas y pagar el arrendamiento de la tierra para el próximo cultivo.

Mi sueño es darles el estudio a sus hijos, para que sean profesionales y así también darle una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
William, 29 years old, only studied through the third grade. He is married and his wife takes care of the household chores. They have a five year old daughter.

William does not have a business, but has been working in agriculture for more than ten years. He learned by working with his father who taught him at an early age to work hard. His crops are a kilometer away and his working hours are from 6:00AM until noon. 

With the loan he will buy fertilizer, pesticides, and pay for the land lease for the next crop. 

"My dream is to educate the children and also to provide a better quality of life."

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticides, and pay for the land lease for the next crop

loans.name: Bartola

texts.es: Bartola es casada  tiene 40 años, y se encuentra muy agradecida por el préstamo anterior porque gracias a eso mejoro el volumen de su cultivo, ella cuenta que antes del crédito ella cultivaba en poca cantidad, pero ahora su cultivo ha ido incrementado, pero ella no es una mujer de limitaciones ni conformista, es por eso que ella desea mejorar sus ingresos, cultivando ahora papa, por tal razón ella solicita un crédito que lo invertirá comprando semillas de papa y fertilizantes. Bartola tiene las esperanzas de contar nuevamente con este crédito para seguir prosperando.
texts.en:
Bartola is 40 years old, and she is married. She is very grateful for the previous loan because, thanks to it, the size of her crop improved. She says that before the loan, she used to grow in small quantities, but her crop yield has been increasing and continue to increase in size. 

But she is not a woman of limitations nor a conformist, and because of this she wants to improve her income by growing potatoes now. For this reason, she is requesting a loan that she will invest in the purchase of potato seeds and fertilizer. Bartola hopes to again count on this loan to continue prospering.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds to grow potatoes.

loans.name: Juvita

texts.en: Juvita is applying for a loan of $1,000 USD to improve her business. She is running a business in her house by opening a beauty salon shop. She is making a good income from her beauty salon and she wants to buy more needed items with the loan. She is living a town near the main road, so many people come to her beauty salon shop and she is open every day. She opened her business two years ago with her own working capital of $50.00.

loans.use: to buy items for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel es un padre de familia responsable y perseverante, tiene 68 años de edad es feliz mente casado, cuenta con una linda familia de 7 hijos de las edades entre 21 y 38 años, de los cuales 6 se encuentran ya casados, vive en una comunidad Suchitepéquez.
Miguel es un padre que ama y protege a su familia, a pesar de su edad Miguel para generar sus ingresos y mantener a su familia trabaja como jornalero en su comunidad realizando todo tipo de trabajo como ayudante de albañil, agricultor, y otras cosas.
A Miguel le preocupa la seguridad de su familia porque las puestas de su casa son de láminas, y en su comunidad en este tiempo hay mucha corrupción, por lo que él se ve obligado a cambiar las puertas de su casa, pero Miguel tiene un pequeño problema, que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para realizar el cambio, Miguel junto a su esposo ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un prestamo de Q 3,200.00 para compra puertas de estructuras metálicas para su casa.
El gran sueño de Miguel es poder contar con este crédito, para que su familia este más segura, y poner un negocio de molino de nixtamal.
texts.en:
Miguel is a responsible and persevering father. He is 68 years old and happily married. His beautiful family includes seven children between the ages of 21 and 38, six of whom are married. He lives in the community of Suchitepéquez.

Miguel is a loving father who is protective of his family. Despite his age, Miguel is able to earn an income and sustain his family by working as a day laborer in his community. He does all types of work such as a masonry assistant, a farm laborer, and other jobs.

Miguel is concerned about his family’s safety because the doors of his home are made of laminate. There is a great deal of corruption in his community, so Miguel feels obligated to replace the doors of his home. However, he has one small problem, which is the lack of sufficient funds to make this change. Miguel and his wife decided to request a loan in the amount of 3,200 GTQ in order to buy metal doors for his house.

Miguel’s dream is to receive this loan so that his family can feel more secure. He would also like to start a business of processing cornmeal.

loans.use: to buy metal doors to make his house more secure.

loans.name: Eva Sebastiana

texts.es:
Eva es una mujer trabajadora, responsable, admirable, tiene 44 años vive en una comunidad denominada Panajachel.
Eva para que a su familia no le haga falta nada se dedica a la venta de frutas en una de las calles más transitadas de su comunidad esta labor lo realiza ella desde hace 12 años, pero para mejorar sus ingresos se dedica a la venta de plátanos fritos por las tardes.
Eva gracias a sus buenos servicios tiene mucha clientela, por lo que ahora ella se ve a la necesidad de comprar una nueva carreta donde pueda exhibir mejor sus frutas, pero una de las dificultades que ella tiene es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder comprar su carreta de exhibición, por lo que ella solicita un préstamo  que lo utilizara para comprarlo.
Eva sueña con poder terminar de construir su casa para que sus hijos tengan un mejor lugar donde vivir.
texts.en: Eva is a hardworking, responsible and admirable woman.  She is 44 years old and lives in the community of Panajachel.  In order to provide for her family, Eva works selling fruit on one of the busiest roads in her community.  She has worked in this trade for 12 years, but she also sells fried plantains in the afternoons to supplement her income.  Thanks to her great service, Eva has many customers, which is why she is now in need of purchasing a new cart where she can display her fruit better.  However, one of the challenges that she faces is that she does not have enough money to purchase the cart, which is why she is seeking a loan.  Eva dreams of being able to build a house so that her children may have a better place where to live.

loans.use: purchase a cart to sell her fruit from.

loans.name: Fabio Oswaldo

texts.es:
Fabio es un hombre trabajador y responsable él tiene 44 años vive en una comunidad de panajachel. 
Fabio para ganar su pan de cada día se dedica a la venta de plátanos  fritos en las principales calles de su comunidad, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también vende frutas  en bolsitas, el realiza esta actividad desde hace un año, él lo realiza con el único fin de mantener a su familia y que tengan todo lo necesario.
Fabio se ha dado cuenta que su pequeño negocio ha funcionado muy bien, por lo que él ahora quiere mejorar sus servicios, él ha pesado en comprar una carreta donde pueda exhibir mejor sus frutas y donde sus plátanos tengan una mejor presentación, pero el no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder comprarlo por lo que ahora solicita un préstamo para poder realizar esta compra.
El gran anhelo de Fabio es mejorar su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos y seguir construyendo su casa para su familia.
texts.en:
Fabio is a hardworking and responsible man.  He is 44 years old and lives in the community of Panajachel. In order to make a living, Fabio works selling plantains on the main roads of his community.  However, in an effort to supplement his income, he also sells bagged fruit, which he has been doing for about a year.  He sells fruit with the sole purpose of supporting and providing for his family.  

Fabio has noticed that his small business has been functioning very well, and he now wants to improve his services.  He is thinking of buying a cart where he can better display his fruit and his plantains, however he does not have enough money to purchase it.  For this reason, he is seeking a loan to make this purchase.  Fabio's biggest challenge is improving his business so that he can increase his earnings and continue building a house for his family.

loans.use: purchase a cart to sell fruit from.

loans.name: Nora

texts.es:
Ella es Nora una mujer increíble, ella es sonriente, alegre, siempre ve el lado positivo a las cosas, fue madre soltera cabeza de familia de nada más y nada menos que 8 hijos, una cifra increíble, generar el sustento de una familia tan número no es nada fácil pero ella sigue en pie con su negocio de confección a terceros donde ofrece tres empleos, en la foto junto a ella se ve uno de sus empleados.
Personas como ella, con ese carácter, con esa energía, con esas ganas de progresos son las que valen la pena apoyar, en el momento tu puedes hacer parte de la sorprendente Historia de esta mujer que sola fue capaz de criar a 8 hijos, aprendiendo empíricamente del mundo de la confección y más ahora que necesita un préstamo para comprar una maquina plana y una recubridora.
texts.en:
Nora is an incredible woman. She is always smiling and cheerful, and sees the positive side of things. She is a single mother and head of a family of no more but no less than 8 children, an incredible figure. To support a family of this size is not easy, but she continues to this day with her business as a third-party clothing maker, and she has three employees. In the photo, one of her employees is shown next to her. 

People such as Nora, with her character, with her energy, and with her desire to succeed, are those that are worth supporting. At this moment, you can be a part of the amazing story of this woman that was able to raise 8 children on her own. She has learned about the world of garment-making through observation and experiment, and now she needs a loan to buy a flat sewing machine and a coverstitch machine.

loans.use: to buy a flat sewing machine to improve her business.

loans.name: Manishak

texts.en:
Manishak and her husband live in Aghitu village in the Syunik region. They have been involved in agriculture for more than 15 years and are skilled farmers. The couple's farm includes cows, calves and some hens, and on the arable land near their house, they cultivate wheat, emmer wheat and potatoes.

Manishak with love and care, also takes care of a small orchard where nut, apple and pear trees are grown. After selling the gathered harvest in the local markets, the couple earns an income that is only for covering their basic daily needs. To develop their farming business further, Manishak asks lenders to support her with this loan. She plans to purchase a cow, 13 lambs, fuel and forage for land cultivation needed for the farm.

This is her second loan. Unfortunately, the first loan, which she got from local financial institutions before, was very difficult to return back, and Manishak faced some difficulties. However, thanks to her hard work during recent times, Manishak and her husband were able to run their agribusiness in a sustainable way, ensuring that they will be able to cover the monthly payments. So, Manishak has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second-chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for a cow, 13 lambs, fuel and forage for land cultivation

loans.name: Elmira

texts.en:
Elmira and her husband live in Zovasar village. They are intensively involved in a farming business where they keep livestock of cows, lambs, calves, piglets and hens and cultivate potatoes and grass as well. 

Elmira takes care of the farm and house, and her husband sells the gathered harvest in local markets. To be able to enlarge their farm with five piglets, and two heifers and to purchase forage for feeding the livestock, Elmira has applied for this loan. 

As this is her first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products before, because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to pay for five piglets, two heifers and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Monica Patricia

texts.es:
Ella es Monica una perseverante y recursiva madre cabeza de familia, responsable de un hogar, donde vive junto con sus dos hijos los cuales tiene estudiando y los alimenta bien. Monica se desempeña en el campo de los servicios, alquilando lavadoras una actividad muy común en zonas de bajos recursos que no tienen como pagar un electrodoméstico como este.
Inicio su negocio como necesidad económica ante la imposibilidad de trabajar por ejercer su papel como ama de casa, pero en medio de la necesidad surgió esta buena idea que la tiene en una estabilidad económica aceptable para vivir.

Monica está muy esperanzada con la demanda que en el momento tiene y esto la motivo a solicitar un préstamo para completar el dinero de la compra de dos lavadoras.

Con este préstamo quiere mejorar sus ingresos y esta capital lo quiere destinar para construir su casa en concreto, pues la madera es algo inestable.

Apoya a esta empresaria, busca con trabajo cambiar su futuro y el de sus hijos.
texts.en:
This is Monica. She is persevering and resourceful mother who is a head of household. She lives with her two children, who are in school and she feeds them well. Monica works in the service sector. She rents out washing machines, which is a very common activity in low income areas where they can't pay for an appliance like this. 

She started her business out of necessity because finding a job was impossible due to her role as a housewife. But from necessity came the good idea that has given her acceptable financial stability to live. 

Monica is very hopeful with the demand she has at this time, and that has motivated her to ask for a loan to have all the money she needs to buy the two washing machines.

With this loan, she wants to improve her income and she wants to use this capital to build her house from concrete, because wood is somewhat unstable.   

Support this businesswoman. She is seeking to change her and her two children's future with work.

loans.use: to buy two washing machines to have more coverage.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es: Santiago un hombre amable y honrado de 49 años de edad, un padre de familia de campo dedicado a la agricultura, él cuenta que gracias al crédito anterior que lo ayude de gran forma a comprar sus insumos agrícolas pudo sembrar a tiempo y producir una buena cosecha aunque lamentablemente el precio que tuvo la cosecha fue bastante baja pero gracias a Dios logro solventar su deuda, él ahora  solicita un nuevo crédito para invertir nuevamente en su cultivo comprando sus semillas y fertilizantes. Él tiene las esperanzas de conseguir nuevamente el crédito y mejorar sus ingresos este año.
texts.en: Santiago, a friendly and honorable 49-year-old man, is the father of a family in the countryside that makes a living in agriculture. He says that thanks to the previous loan, which helped a great deal in buying agricultural supplies, he was able to plant on time and produce a good harvest. The price that the harvest had was unfortunately quite low, but thanks to God he was able to pay off his loan. He is now asking for a new loan to invest in his crop again, buying seeds and fertilizer. He hopes to get the loan again and to improve his earnings this year.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds

loans.name: Arlyn Carolina

texts.es:
Arlyn Carolina es una joven estudiante de publicidad, ella solicita un préstamo para poder cubrir sus gastos educativo, esta es su historia: Hola soy Arlyn Carolina tengo 25 años, actualmente desempleada y con mis estudios universitarios detenidos por  causa de desempleo, nací y crecí  en Santo domingo R.D, y vivo con mis padres  mi hermana e hija en esta ciudad, soy soltera y tengo una niña de 2 años de de edad, mis padres trabajan, mi madre operaria y mi padre seguridad.
Empecé a estudiar en la Universidad Pro Educación y Cultura  (UNAPEC)  Publicidad, elegí esta carrera porque antes de entrar en esta empecé a trabajar en el área y me desenvolvía muy bien aparte me gusto y la disfruto de eso se trata que te guste tu trabajo y lo que haces, mis materias favoritas es la creatividad y sus materias afines, el mercadeo etc..
Necesito un préstamo para poder terminar mi carrera ya que en este país es complicado desempeñarse en un área y que te ofrezcan la oportunidad de un empleo si no estás preparado académicamente, si no recibo el préstamo me quedaría estancado sin terminar mi carrera la cual está en termino solo me quedan pocas materia y monográfico .
Mi meta es terminar mi carrera trabajar en el área, seguir desarrollándome en el área, trabajar y así darle un futuro a mi hija y ensenarle que hay que estudiar para tener un buen futuro, cuando termine mi carrera quiero y espero trabajar en el área de mi carrera o afines,  Publicidad, Mercadeo y/o agencias.
texts.en:
Arlyn Carolina is a young advertising student, she is asking for a loan to cover her education costs, this is her story: 

Hello I'm Arlyn Carolina, I am 25 years old, currently unemployed and with my university studies halted because of unemployment. I was born and grew up in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic and I live with my parents, my sister and daughter in this city. I am single and have a daughter who is 2 years old. My parents work, my mother as an operative and my father in security.

I began to study advertising at the Universidad Pro Educación y Cultura  (UNAPEC - University Pro Education and Culture). I chose this degree because before starting it I worked in this area and got on very well, besides I liked it and enjoyed it. In terms of liking your work and what you do,                          my favourite subjects are creativity and its related subjects, marketing etc...

I need a loan to be able to finish my degree, as in this country it is difficult to work in an field, and for them to offer the opportunity of a job if you are not academically qualified. If I do not receive the loan I would remain stuck without finishing my degree. To finish I only need a few subjects and monograph.               

My aim is to finish my degree to work in the field, continue developing in the field, to work and so give my daughter a future and teach her that you have to study to have a good future. When I finish my degree I want and hope to work in the field of my degree or related fields, advertising, marketing and or for agencies.

loans.use: to pay higher education costs.

loans.name: Diego Ceur

texts.es:
Diego es un joven hombre de 19 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de comunicación social.
Él es inteligente, responsable, comprometido con sus estudios y constante. Sus estudios lo realiza en la universidad pública situada en el centro de la ciudad y es la casa de estudios superiores más prestigiosas del lugar, partícipe de muchos movimientos sociales durante las dictaduras militares, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el díe entre 5-19 grados centígrados.
Diego es de tez morena, cabello negro corto, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará el cual ya no habla porque estudia y vive en la ciudad. Su vida la realiza en compañía de sus padres que trabajan, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con los servicios de gas domiciliario, energía eléctrica, agua potable y alcantarillado. Él estudia la carrera de comunicación social y se encuentra en 2 año de 5 años que dura la carrera; disfruta observando y escuchando a las personas, le gusta ponerse en el lugar de los demás, su carácter es amable y cordial, es muy seguro para argumentar su posición con un lenguaje claro y sencillo; “inicie mis estudios por la necesidad de conocimientos para la elaboración de proyectos, me siento dispuesto a trabajar y convivir con los demás para la realización de labores múltiples…”comenta. Su sueño es ser profesional para trabajar y ayudar a los demás y desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil y material de estudio como libros especializados. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que se dedica al estudio profesional.
Es por esos motivos que Diego solicita un préstamo para la compra de una computadora portátil y libros para continuar estudiando.
texts.en:
Diego is a young man who is 19 years of age, single, and has no children. He is studying for a degree in Social Communication.

Diego is intelligent, responsible, committed to his studies, and steadfast. He attends classes at a public university located in the central part of the city. It is one of the most prestigious higher education institutions in the area. Many social movements have taken place here during the time of military rule. The weather is cold and dry, with a temperature that varies throughout the day between 5-19 degrees Celsius.

Diego has a dark complexion, short black hair, brown eyes, and a thin build. His native language is Aymará, but he doesn’t speak it because he studies and lives in the city. He shares his life with his parents who are working. They live in a brick and cement house with a corrugated metal roof. The house receives services such as heating fuel, electricity, running water, and sewer lines. Diego is studying for a degree in Social Communication and is in the second year of a five-year program. He enjoys observing and listening to people, as well as putting himself in the place of others. His personality is friendly and outgoing. Diego is very confident when it comes to arguing his position with clear and straightforward language. “I started my studies because of a need for knowledge in order to develop my projects. I am willing to work and live with others in order to carry out multiple tasks,” says Diego. His dream is to become a working professional who helps others. He would like to purchase a portable computer and study materials, such as specialized books. This is her first loan cycle with Emprender. He has been pursuing his professional studies for two years.

For the reasons previously mentioned, Diego is requesting a loan in order to buy a portable computer and books so that he can continue studying.

loans.use: to buy a portable computer and books so that he can continue his studies.

loans.name: Karomatullo

texts.en: Karomatullo is a hardworking man. He was born in 1973. He is living in a village. He is married and has two children. Karomatullo is a goal oriented and conscious person. He is an agrarian man; he likes to work with livestock and land. He keeps livestock and plants potatoes and corn in his yard. Now, he has three head of livestock and he wants to buy two more. He is planning to plant and grow more productive corn and potatoes. Karomatullo wants to buy two head of horned cattle and hopes to make payment on time from the gained profit of his harvest. He requested a loan 1,050 USD to buy two head of horned cattle. He awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy two head of horned cattle

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
La socia Bertha se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos de belleza, la socia vende lápiz labiales, cremas y perfumes,la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de productos de belleza. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cremas, lápiz labiales y perfumes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Bertha continues with her business selling beauty products. She sells lipstick, creams and perfumes. She is a hardworking woman who through her business hopes to get ahead. Her dream is to increase her beauty product business.

Bertha is asking for a loan to buy creams, lipsticks and perfumes. She is happy about the loan and promises to meet her payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy creams, lipsticks and perfumes.

loans.name: Micaela

texts.es:
Micaela es una muchacha de 26 años de edad es  soltera vive junto a sus padres en una comunidad de Sololá.
Micaela para generar sus ingresos y apoyar a sus padres con las necesidades de la casa, ha buscado la forma de cómo ganar su pan de cada día es por eso que tiene una pequeña tienda de compra y venta de abarrotes en  el lugar de su domicilio.
Micaela es una joven optimista y con los sueños de superación ahora ha tomado la iniciativa de mejorar los servicios de su pequeña tienda, comprando más productos para ofrecerles a los clientes, pero para poder realizar su sueño ella no cuenta con una buena cantidad de dinero, por lo que decidió realizar un préstamo que lo invertirá comprando recitos, dulces, gaseosas, azúcar, aceite.
Micela tiene las esperanzas de conseguir el crédito para hacer su sueño realidad.
texts.en: Micaela is a 26-year-old girl. She is single and lives with her parents in a community of Sololá. To generate earnings and support her parents with their household needs, Micaela has sought a way to earn her daily bread. For this reason she has a small grocery store in her home. Micaela is an optimistic young woman, and with dreams of overcoming obstacles she has now taken the initiative to improve the services of her small store, buying more products to offer to her customers. However, she doesn't have much money to be able to achieve her dream, so she decided to take a loan that she will invest in buying toiletries, sweets, soft drinks, sugar, and oil. Micaela hopes to get the loan in order to make her dream a reality.

loans.use: to buy toiletries, sweets, soft drinks, sugar, and oil for her store

loans.name: Luiggi Anderson

texts.es:
Luiggi es un joven estudiante de SENATI, natural de la ciudad de Paramonga ubicada a 5 horas al norte de Lima. Su familia está compuesta por su mami y 4 hermanos. Su padre trabaja en el extranjero como obrero, tiene otro compromiso de cual proviene uno de sus hermanos. Su madre también tiene otro compromiso, del cual proviene sus 3 hermanos menores, ella trabaja en Paramonga en campañas de repartición de productos, los ingresos son variables porque no trabajan con sueldo fijo, solo por horas.
Luiggi emigró a Lima y vive en una habitación alquilada, actualmente recibe el apoyo mínimo de su madre con la ayuda de sus tíos, para que no deje de estudiar; pero debido a la actual y difícil situación por la cual está atravesando su familia se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un Crédito para no truncar sus sueños.
Luiggi actualmente cursa el III Ciclo de Mecánica de Mantenimiento, carrera que le gusta desde muy pequeño y siente que lo beneficiará mucho permitiéndole apoyar a su madre con la educación de sus hermanos. De no contar con el apoyo de KIVA, Luiggi hubiera dejado de estudiar para dedicarse solo a trabajar, hasta poder reunir un monto de dinero considerable que le permita retomar sus estudios.
Agradece mucho el apoyo que le brinda KIVA para que pueda culminar su carrera y llegar a ser un excelente profesional altamente capacitado, capaz de supervisar los planes de mantenimiento que refiere su carrera.
texts.en:
Luiggi is a young student at SENATI. He's from the city of Paramonga, 5 hours north of Lima. His family is made up of his mother and 4 brothers. His father works abroad as a laborer, and he has another partner which is the provenance of one of his brothers. His mother also has another partner, a relationship from which his 3 younger brothers came. His mother works in Paramonga in product distribution. Income is variable because she doesn't make a fixed salary, just hourly.

Luiggi moved to Lima and lives in a rented room. He currently receives minimal support from his mother with the help of his uncles, so that he can stay in school. But due to a current difficult situation that his family is going through, he is in need of a loan so that he doesn't have to cut short his dreams.

Luiggi is currently in the third cycle of Mechanical Maintenance, a career that he's been interested in since he was little and which he thinks will allow him to help his mother with his brothers' education.

Without KIVA's help, Luiggi would have had to leave his schooling to just work until he could make enough money to go back to his studies. He is very grateful to the support that KIVA gave him to be able to finish his degree and become a highly-capable professional who can supervise the maintenance plans indicated in his degree.

loans.use: to finish his degree in Mechanical Maintenance at SENATI and support his family.

loans.name: Agus

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of the new Ruma agents, Agus. Agus lives in Sukabumi, a suburban area located in West Java, around three hours' drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Agus lives there with his wife and his two daughters. He owns a stall that sells mobile phone accessories and mobile airtime credits for his community. He just joined Ruma a few months ago, and he learned about Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive, who came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he already heard before that Ruma has the best service and system.

As the business grows, Agus is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the loan to process more mobile airtime credits to his community, so his community members can easily connect with their loved ones, no matter how far apart they are. Besides, from their personal perspective, Agus and his wife realized that they have to save some money for their daughters’ education. Having known about the importance, your loan will be very useful to help Agus improve his business (and if the business has been improved, it will be easier for Agus and his wife to save more money for their daughters’ education) and accordingly, his community, which needs access to such services.  

Agus’s goal with Ruma in the near future is to serve as an e-commerce business for his customers. As seen in the photo, Agus is the one who is standing in his own stall. He will be very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases and utility bill payments (like electricity, water, etc.) for members of his local community.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
Natividad, mejoro su negocio con la compra de cerdos y materiales para elaborar sus productos de jarcia, tuvo una baja en sus ingresos a consecuencia de la poca productividad de la cosecha de granos básicos, pero aun así cumplió con sus obligaciones.
En esta ocasión solicita un nuevo crédito para  pagar el arrendamiento del terreno en el que realizara su próxima siembra de granos básicos, además podrá comprar  cerdos y ganado, le permitirá seguir trabajando y cubriendo las necesidades familiares.
texts.en:
Natividad improved her business by buying pigs and materials for making rope products. She had a drop in her earnings as a result of low productivity from her harvest of basic grains. However, she was still able to fulfill her obligations.

On this occasion, she is requesting a new loan in order to pay the rent on the land that will be used for her next planting of basic grains. In addition, she will buy pigs and cattle so that she can continue working and providing for her family’s needs.

loans.use: to pay the rent on her farmland and to buy pigs and cattle.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Justo atrás de la foto de Luz Marina se está construyendo no solo un negocio, se está construyendo un sueño, una ilusión, de una mujer quien toda la vida le toco emplearse ante la imposibilidad de formar un negocio ya sea por la falta de experiencia o por falta de capitación  o incluso una voz de ánimo, pero poco a poco esto ha ido cambiando y ahora Luz Marina está impaciente porque terminen las obras para INICIAR rápidamente su negocio de tienda de productos de la canasta familiar.

Ella es una mujer de 45 años de edad, madre de dos hijos uno de ellos menores de edad, a los cuales piensa apoyarlos en todo momento y por eso le urge tanto ser autosuficiente, generar su propio ingreso todo por sus hijos, por su hogar por ella.

Luz Marina se encuentra solicitando un préstamo la razón es que gran parte de sus ahorros los destino a la construcción del local, pero con el monto que se encuentra solicitando quiere realizar adecuaciones que van desde la pintada, compra de estanterías y vitrinas, hasta la compra de surtido en productos de aseo general y personas, abarrotes, productos de refrigeración y víveres.
texts.en:
In the photograph, behind Luz Marina, there is not only a business being built, but a dream is being built.  This is the dream of a woman who worked her whole life despite the seemingly impossible task of starting her own business based on a lack of experience, a lack of training and even a lack of courage.  However, little by little, this has all changed and now, Luz Marina is eager because she is quickly nearing the end of her preparations to open her grocery store.  

Luz Marina is a 45 year old mother of two children, one of whom is still underage, who she hope to support as much as possible.  For this reason, she wants to be self-sufficient and generate her own income for her children, her household, and herself.  Luz Marina is seeking a loan because a large portion of her savings is being used to build the actual store, but she is hoping to use the loan to purchase supplies such as painting, shelves and cabinets, as well as an assortment of products and groceries.

loans.use: purchase cabinets, shelves, paint and assorted groceries.

loans.name: Los Panaderos De Choquesquibel Group

texts.es:
Juan Andrés es un hombre de 54 años de edad es casado cuenta con una linda familia de 6 hijos de las edades entre 9 y 25 años, vive en un lugar de Sololá.
Juan Andrés (el primero del lado derecho) es un padre de familia que ama y protege a su familia, el realiza una bonita actividad porque se dedica a la elaboración de pan desde hace 3 años, con esta labor él ha logrado mantener a su familia, pero para mejorar sus ingresos también trabaja como jornalero labrando la tierra.
Juan Andrés ahora ha empezado a prepararse con sus materiales porque ya se ha cerca la semana mayor donde hay mucha demanda de pan, pero para poder contar con todos los materiales necesarios, es importante  contar con un horno donde se pueda  preparar mejor el pan, es por eso  que Juan Andrés a empezando a construir su nuevo horno, pero el en este momento ha carecido de dinero por lo que ha organizado a un grupo de personas para completar su capital y solicitar un préstamo que lo invertirá  en la terminación de su pequeño horno y compara de harina, royal, huevos y leña.
El gran anhelo de Juan Andrés es poder construir una casa para sus hijos.
texts.en:
Juan Andrés, 54, is married and has a nice family of 6 children between 9 and 25. They live in Sololá.

Juan Andrés (the first person from the right) is a father who loves and protects his family. For the past three years he has earned a living baking bread. 

He has been able to take care of his family with this work. However, to earn extra income, he also works as a day laborer working on farms. 

Juan Andrés has started to prepare for his busiest bread week. This is why he has started building a new oven. However, currently he has run out of money which is why he has organized a group to help with the remainder and to request a loan to invest in finishing the small oven as well as to buy flour, Royal brand baking powder,  eggs and firewood. 

His biggest dream is to build a house for his children.

loans.use: to buy flour, Royal brand baking powder, eggs and firewood to make bread.

loans.name: Domingas

texts.en:
A $1,000.00 loan is offered to Domingas to improve her business. She opened her kiosk in 2009 with her own working capital. She will use the loan to buy stock to keep in her store like plates, spoons, pans, buckets, bowls, and balls. She is generating a good income from sales.

She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. She is living in a town with her family and her husband is a driver. She is happy to be offered this loan to improve her living condition in the future.

loans.use: to buy plates, spoons, pans, buckets, bowls, and balls.

loans.name: Diego Edisson

texts.es:
Diego es un hombre de 35 años de edad, propietario de un almacén de venta y reparación de repuesto de bicicletas y bicicletas como tal, su negocio en el momento es nuevo solo lleva un año de operación pero se siente motivado porque está empezando a tener buenos resultados.

Diego es un hombre que vive con su pareja con la cual tienen 2 hijos uno de 14 años de edad y una pequeña de tan solo 3 años.

Diego tiene muy buenas ideas para este año, quiere implementar y traer repuestos de buena marca y duraderos para sus clientes, pero el tema del dinero es lo que le preocupa pues su negocio al estar apenas en marcha no genera suficientes utilidades.

Solicita un apoyo financiero para la compra der surtido de repuestos para bicicleta, Rines llantas, la novedad es que quiere traer diseños que impacten a los usuario y haga que estos lo recomienden ante otros y así volverlo un ciclo que sea más rentable para él.
texts.en:
Diego is 35 years old, and owns a bicycle shop in which he sells bicycles and spare parts. His business is still new at the moment and has only been in operation for one year, but he feels motivated because it is beginning to bring good results.

Diego lives with his partner with whom he has 2 children, one who is 14 years old and a young daughter who is only 3 years old.

Diego has many ideas for this year. He wants to implement and provide well-made and durable spare parts for his customers, but the issue of money is what worries him, since his business just launched and does not generate sufficient returns.

He applies for financial support for the purchase of a supply of spare bicycle parts, such as tire rims. He wants to bring designs that impact the user so that these users recommend them to others and in this way creates a cycle that would be more profitable for him.

loans.use: to purchase spare bicycle parts that are innovative and different than those seen in the market; and also to purchase bicycles.

loans.name: Dora Lina

texts.es:
Dora es una mujer de 39 años de edad, ella es madre de 6 hijos, 5 de ellos menores de edad, sus hijos tienen la siguientes edades, 19, 16,15, 13 ,6 ,4 años, al tener hijos tan pequeños su responsabilidad es criarlos y es por ellos que inteligentemente y ante una necesidad en el barrio desarrollo una actividad para poder generar ingresos la cual es la venta de comidas rápidas un negocio que había cerca de su zona y en que puede trabajar cerca a su hogar.

Ella aprendió sola y debido al número de sus hijos que tiene es clara la necesidad e importancia de su puesto de trabajo, incluso en ocasiones se queda sin capital para invertir debido a los gastos que le generan su familia.

Dora solicita un préstamo parta la compra de surtido en general como lo son, salsas, panes, carnes, plátanos, aceites, papa, arepas, entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Dora is a 39-year-old woman. She is the mother of 6 children, 5 of whom are minors. Her children are of the following ages: 19, 16, 15, 13, 6, and 4. Having children of such young ages, her responsibility is to raise them and it is for them that she intelligently and responding to a need in the neighborhood developed an activity that could generate earnings, which is the sale of fast food. The business is close to her area and she can work close to her home. 

She taught herself and due to the number of children she has, the necessity and importance of her business is clear. Occasionally she goes without money to spend due to the expenses that her family generates.

Dora is applying for a loan for the purchase of general supplies such as sauces, breads, meats, bananas, oils, potatoes, and arepas (a type of tortilla that is common in Colombia), among other products.

loans.use: to buy general supplies, such as sauces, breads, meats, bananas, oils, potatoes and arepas

loans.name: Adbeel Leumin

texts.es: Adbeel es una joven de 23 años de edad es soltera. Ella se encuentra estudiando la carrera de diseño de modas. Ella eligió dicha carrera por tener la capacidad de creatividad al culminar sus estudios le gustaría trabajar en confección. El crédito lo invertirá en el pago de las pensiones y matrícula. Su mayor deseo es lograr Culminar sus estudios que es una de las metas más importante de su logro personal. Ella agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado
texts.en: Adbeel is a young, single 23-year-old woman. She is studying fashion design. She chose this major because she has creative ability. After finishing her studies she would like to work in dressmaking. The loan will be invested in the payment of tuition and board. Her greatest wish is to complete her studies, which is one of her most important personal goals. She thanks the investors of Kiva for the loan they have provided.

loans.use: to pay tuition and board

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: ALFREDO: Es originario de la comunidad de Nazaret, que se localiza aproximadamente a 65 kilómetros de la ciudad de Bilwi, Municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Es un señor luchador y amable de 59 años de edad, casado con 7 hijos: 6 son mayores de edad e independientes y el menor de 14 años de edad que  estudia su secundaria. Con el propósito de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de brindarle a su familia una vivienda digna y segura, solicita su primer financiamiento para embaldosar su vivienda que actualmente el piso es de tierra, instalarle las puertas y ventanas y terminar de construir su vivienda que poco a poco con gran esfuerzo la ha construido. Su sueño es llegar a tener una vivienda de concreto porque es más seguro y de mayor durabilidad.
texts.en:
Alfredo is originally from the community of Nazaret, which is located approximately 65 kilometers from the city of Bilwi in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. He is a determined and friendly man who is 59 years old, married, and has seven children. Six of his children are grown and independent, while the youngest is 14 years old and in high school.

In order to improve his living conditions and provide a decent and secure home for his family, Alfredo is requesting his first loan so that he can lay down tiles over the existing dirt floor. He will also install doors and windows so that he can finish the construction of his home that he has built gradually with great effort. His dream is to eventually have a concrete house because it is more secure and has greater durability.

loans.use: to install doors, windows, and floor tiles in his house.

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de tan solo 22 años de edad y aunque se sorprendan es padre de dos hijos uno de 10 y otro de 8 años de edad, casos poco comunes pero que se ven, por su prematura actividad sexual tuvo que abandonar sus estudios ante la responsabilidad de ir a salir a buscar el sustento para su familia, empezó |como ayudante le devana trabajos menores, pero ganaba algo para, desde muy joven mostro su sentido de responsabilidad y poco a poco ha ido evolucionando hasta convertirse en lo que es ahora un comerciante de bebidas alcohólicas, y venta de cigarrillos. 

Con el pasar de los años Luis ha ido evolucionando y no quiere parar, su meta para es tener una distribuidora de bebidas alcohólicas y trabajara tal y como le toco en su niñez fuertemente por su familia. 

Con la ayuda de un préstamo Luis quiere comprar una nevera y surtido de bebidas alcohólicas principalmente cerveza y aguardiente.
texts.en:
Luis is a man of only 22 years, but surprisingly a father of two children, one 10-year-old and one 8-year-old. These cases are uncommon but do exist. As a result of his premature sexual activity, he had to abandon his studies due to his responsibility to go out and find a way to support his family. He started as a helper doing small tasks, but he earned something for it. From a very young age he demonstrated a sense of responsibility and little by little he has evolved and changed himself into what he is now- a vender of alcoholic beverages and cigarettes. 

With the passage of the years Luis has evolved and he does not want to stop. His goal is to be a distributor of alcoholic beverages and work as he did in his childhood to strongly support his family. 

With the help of a loan, Luis wants to buy a refrigerator and supply of alcoholic beverages, mainly beer and aguardiente (a popular type of liquor in Colombia).

loans.use: to buy a supply of alcoholic beverages, and a refrigerator to store them

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es:
María, de 52 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja de agricultor y tiene siete hijos, la mayoría ya están acompañados y otros estudian.

María, tiene varios años de tener tienda de productos de primera necesidad y también trabaja junto a su esposo en la siembra de hortalizas como: tomates, ejotes y chiles verdes, el terreno donde tienen las hortalizas no esta muy lejos de su casa y trabaja de lunes a viernes.

El préstamo lo utilizara para comprar más mercadería para su tienda como: maíz, frijoles y otros productos que sus clientes buscan más, de esa manera lograra obtener mejores ingresos y ayudarle un poco a su esposo.

El sueño de María, es que sus hijos estudien y puedan tener un empleo estable.
texts.en:
Maria is 52 years old. She studied until the second grade. She is in a relationship and her partner works in agriculture. She has seven children, the majority of whom are already in relationships and others who are students.

Maria for many years has had a store selling staple products. She also works together with her husband in the cultivation of vegetables such as: tomatoes, green beans and green chilies. The land where they have their crops is not very far from their home and she works Monday through Friday. 

The loan will be used to purchase more merchandise for her store such as: corn, beans and other products that her customers look for more. In this way she aims to obtain greater earnings and help her husband a little. 

Maria's dream is that her children study and that they have stable employment.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her store, such as corn, beans and other products

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan is married and he has 4 children.  He lives in a rental home in El Alto, Bolivia.  

Juan is an employee of a private company and his wife sells cosmetics. 

Juan needs a loan to buy perfumes for his wife's sales business. 

Juan appreciates the help you will give his wife.  

In the photo, Juan is accompanied by his wife and one of his children.

loans.use: to buy perfumes for his wife's sales business

loans.name: Santos Cecilia

texts.es:
Santos, de 31 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada y tiene tres hijas, dos de ellas van a la escuela.

Santos, trabaja  en una venta de zapatos, pero también tiene venta de ropa, ella decidió trabajar para ayudar a pagar los gastos de su familia y para que sus hijas tengan lo necesario, el trabajo está cerca de su casa y el horario es de 
8:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m. de lunes a domingo.
 
Este préstamo será para comprar shorts, blusas, pijamas, camisetas, calcetas y pantalones de esa forma incrementara el inventario de ropa que tiene y tendrán una mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Santos es dedicarse a su negocio siempre y dejar de trabajar en el calzado para tener más tiempo, para dedicárselo a sus hijas.
texts.en:
Santos is 31 years old and studied through the ninth grade. She is in a relationship and has three daughters, two of whom are in school.

Santos works by selling shoes, but she also sells clothes. She decided to work in order to help pay her family’s expenses and provide for her daughters’ needs. Santos works near her home and keeps a schedule of 8:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M., Monday through Sunday.

This loan will be used to buy shorts, blouses, pajamas, T-shirts, socks, and trousers so that she can increase her inventory of clothes. As a result, she can have a better quality of life.

Santos dreams of always dedicating herself to her business so that she can stop selling shoes. This will give her more time to devote herself to her daughters.

loans.use: to buy shorts, blouses, pajamas, T-shirts, socks, and trousers to sell.

loans.name: Jesús

texts.es:
Jesús un padre de familia de 33 años de edad, tiene una linda familia de 3 hijos de las edades entre 5 años y 5 meses todos se encuentran bajo el cuidado de la madre, viven en una comunidad de Sololá.
Jesús es un hombre que le importa las necesidades de su familia es por ella que para generar sus ingresos se dedica a la elaboración de jaspeado el realiza esta actividad desde hace 5 años, gracias a esta labor él ha logrado sacar adelante a su familia.
Jesús gracias al empeño y amor que le pode a su trabajo, sus jaspeados han tenido mucho éxitos en el mercado por lo que el necesita incrementar su pequeño negocio, pero él no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder adquirir sus materiales necesarias, es por tal razón que él solicita un préstamo que lo invertirá en la compra de hilos y tintes de varios colores para la elaboración de jaspeado.
El gran deseo de Jesús es poder tener una casa de terraza, para que sus hijos tengan un mejor lugar donde vivir.
texts.en:
Jesús is a man who cares about his family’s needs, and in order to generate income for them, he works making jaspeado [specially dyed and woven threads used for traditional costumes].  He has been carrying out this activity for five years, and thanks to this work he has managed to provide for his family.

Thanks to the effort and love that Jesús puts into his work, his jaspeado has been very successful in the market, so he needs to expand his small business.  However, he doesn’t have enough capital to acquire the materials that he needs, so he is requesting a loan.  He will invest it in the purchase of thread and dye in various colors for making jaspeado.

Jesus’ great desire is to have a terraced house, so that his children may have a better place to live.

loans.use: to purchase thread and dye for making jaspeado [specially dyed and woven threads] for traditional costumes.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.en:
Manuela runs a kiosk that helps her to generate income for her family. 

Manuela opened her business a year ago with her own working capital of $200.00.  

Manuela is taking a loan of $600.00 USD to improve her business.  She will use the loan to buy fruits and vegetables.

Manuela is a hard working woman, and she hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Budi

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of the Ruma agents, Budi. Budi lives in Kudus, located in the east of Semarang, capital of Central Java, 9 hours drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. 

Budi is happily married. He owns a stall that sells small snacks, drinks, mobile airtime credits and provides bill payment services for his community. 

He joined Ruma a year ago. He found out about Ruma from Ruma’s sales executive that came to his stall. He decided to join Ruma because he is interested in Ruma’s system; the sales executive will be coming to his stall to collect the money. Moreover, his community sees him as a trustworthy mobile provider.

In order to help his business grow, Budi is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to process more mobile airtime credits and bill payment services to his community. 

Your loan will help Budi improve his business and accordingly, his community who needs access to such services.  As seen in the photo, Budi is the one who is sitting in front of his own stall. 

He will be very thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to help him improve his business selling mobile airtime credits

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 58 years old and married with seven children, one of whom is in school.  Editha works hard to provide for her family.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more grocery items like dried fish, bread, sardines, and school supplies.

Editha has borrowed and paid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years, and also earns an income from dried fish vending.

Editha aspires to save enough money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries like dried fish, bread, sardines and school supplies.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 49 years old and married. He is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

George has a buy and sell natural medicines business in the Philippines.  George has been in this business for 15 years. 

George requested a 19,500 PHP loan amount through NWTF in order to buy more inventory of herbal medicines to offer for sale.

In the future, George would like to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy more inventory of herbal medicines to offer for sale

loans.name: Rosa Elena

texts.es:
Rosa, de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, está acompañada y tiene una niña de seis meses de nacida y su pareja trabaja de transportista en un carro, solo ellos tres viven en su casa.

Rosa, tiene un negocio de productos de primera necesidad ( tienda) desde hace dos años, lo inició por la necesidad de obtener más ingresos y ayudarle a su pareja con los gastos, el horario de atención es de 6:00 a.m. a 7:00 p.m.

Rosa, solicita el préstamo para comprar frijoles, maíz, azúcar y arroz para tener más productos y por supuesto más ingresos para su familia.

Lo que desea Rosa en un futuro es, llegar a tener un negocio más grande, el actual préstamo servirá para mejorar su tienda porque pondrá a la venta más productos y mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Rosa is 34 years old and studied up to Grade 2. She is in a relationship and has a 6 month old baby. Her partner works as a transportation worker in a car. Only the three of them live in their house. Rosa has had a business, a store which sells basic food items for two years. She started it out of the need to obtain more income and help her partner with the expenses. She is open from 6 am until 7 pm. Rosa is requesting a loan to buy beans, corn, sugar and rice to have more products and of course have more income for her family. What Rosa wants in the future is to have a larger business. This loan will serve to improve her store since she can have more product on sale and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy beans, corn, sugar and rice to have more products.

loans.name: Jaina

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Jaina works hard to support her family. She is a fisherwoman in the Philippines and earns additional income from farming vegetables.

Jaina has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans through NWTF. She is now borrowing 14,000 PHP to buy an additional bundle of fishing net. She hopes that her hard work will help her to continue expanding her business and attain her dream of a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy an additional bundle of fishing net.

loans.name: Wendy Edith

texts.es:
Wendy, de 21 años de edad, solo estudio hasta sexto grado, es madre soltera de dos niños, uno va a la escuela y el otro lo cuida ella porque aún no tiene edad para asistir a la escuela.

Wendy, tiene varios años de tener venta de refrescos, tostadas de plátano, frutas y verduras con su hermana, se dedico
a vender estos productos, por la necesidad de que sus hijos tengan lo necesario para vivir, eso implica sacrificarse, ella
se levanta todos los días a las 4:00 a.m. para ir a comprar al mercado lo que necesita para la venta.
 
El préstamo lo utilizará para comprar frutas y verduras para vender, ya que estos son los productos que más buscan los clientes, de esa forma tendrá más ingresos y mejor calidad de vida.

El sueño de Wendy, es tener un puesto grande, para tener de todo lo que los clientes buscan.
texts.en:
Wendy is 21 years old and only studied up to Grade 6. She is the single mother of two children. One goes to school and she takes care of the other as he is not old enough to attend school.

For a number of years Wendy has had a business selling soft drinks, plantain chips, fruit and vegetables with her sister. She started to sell these products out of the necessity to provide what her children need to live.
