María, ha trabajado con ganado, pero actualmente trabaja en la crianza de pollos de engorde y en engorde de cerdos y tiene un molino, en ninguno de estos trabajos tiene horario fijo, ya que todos los realiza en su casa, desde la mañana hasta por la tarde o incluso por la noche. 

María, solicita el crédito para comprar concentrado, vacunas y comederos para los pollos y los cerdos, ya que este es la principal fuente de ingresos que tiene, para poder tener ingresos económicos en su hogar y ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos.

El sueño de María, es poder seguir trabajando hasta lograr arreglar su vivienda y de ser posible poner una tienda también; para poder seguir ayudando a su familia. Además, desea hacer una galera más grande, para llegar a tener mucho más pollos de engorde.
texts.en:
Maria, 56, was raised by her parents and has a fourth grade education.  She has been in a relationship for eight years and her partner works as a security guard for a company in the city.  Maria has seven children and three of them are still at home.  She also has two grandchildren who attend school.

Maria has worked with cattle but currently is raising chickens and pigs, and also running a mill.  With no fixed work schedule, she works at home from morning until afternoon, and sometimes until night.

The loan she is requesting is to buy animal feed, vaccines and troughs for her chickens and pigs.  This is her main source of income and she needs it for her household and to help her husband with the expenses.

Maria's dream is to continue working so she can fix her house and possibly open a store.  She also wants to build a larger pen to to raise more chickens.

loans.use: To buy feed, vaccine and troughs for her chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase coal and iron to make his products.

loans.name: Betty Rebeca

texts.es: BETTY REBECA: Edad es una joven cordial y alegre de 23 años de edad, originaria de Puerto Cabezas, casada con dos hijos menores de edad. Desde  hace 4 años habitan en una casa construida de madera y de tambo, que actualmente necesita reparación.  Es por eso que solicitan un préstamo para cambiar madera rústica, madera cepillada, postes de madera, clavos y cubrir costos de mano de obra. Ella y su marido sueñan con tener una casa de concreto que tenga mejores condiciones para sus hijos y sobre todo mayor seguridad y establecer una pulpería, para contar con otra fuente de ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Betty Rebeca is a warm-hearted and cheerful young woman who is originally from Puerto Cabezas. She is 23 years of age, married, and has two young children. For the past four years, she has been living in a wooden stilt house that is currently in need of repair. This is why she is requesting a loan in order to replace the old wood. Betty will buy lumber, wooden posts, nails, and cover the cost of labor.

She and her husband dream of having a concrete house in order to provide better conditions, and most importantly, greater security for their children. Betty also wants to establish a grocery store so that she can have another source of income and be able to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for lumber, wooden posts, nails, and labor in order to replace the old wood in her house.

loans.name: Milagro Del Carmen

texts.es: Milagro de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica junto a su esposo a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y frijol, posee mas de 20 años de experiencia en ese rubro, ya que desde muy joven ha trabajado en eso, cultiva la cosecha en verano e invierno y la comercializa en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder tener mejores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Milagro, 49 years old, lives in her own home with her spouse. They both work in agriculture, planting maize and beans. She has more than 20 years of experience in this domain, since she has worked in agriculture since she was very young. She grows her crops in the summer and then sells them in the winter in the different markets near her home.

Milagro is requesting this loan to purchase agricultural inputs such as fertilizers, manure, insecticides, etc., and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph. This will allow her to earn better revenues and enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, manure, insecticides etc. and to improve her land.

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es: Marta de 69 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y pollos de engorde, cuenta con más de 8 años de experiencia en la actividad, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y ya tiene clientes establecidos, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas pollos y concentrados para seguir con la crianza y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Marta, 69 years old, lives in her own home with her family. She works raising fattening pigs and chickens. She has more than eight years of experience in this activity. She sells her products in nearby towns and already has an established customer base. Marta manages to cover some of her household expenses through her earnings. 

Marta is requesting a loan to purchase concentrated feed and more chickens in order to continue raising animals, which will provide her with better earnings.

loans.use: to buy concentrated feed and more chickens.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 60 years old and married with seven children. She works very hard to provide for them.
Lorna runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, shampoo, noodles, eggs, sugar, and coffee.
Lorna has been in this business for 15 years. 
She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, personal care products, shampoo, noodles, eggs, sugar, and coffee.

loans.name: Hayde

texts.en:
Hayde is a married woman who is 59 years old and has six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Hayde raises pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a loan of 19,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional sacks of feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Hayde has been in this business for 3 years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of feed, vitamins and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.en: Mariam is a married woman from the town of Likoni who has two children. She is a very hardworking person who has always worked and striven to reach her goals and objectives. She owns a food cafe in downtown Likoni. She has had it for more than five years and comments that it is well renowned in the neighborhood and thanks to that she has a good clientele. She defines herself as a person who always strives to the maximum to attain what she wants. Mariam is asking for this loan to purchase tomatoes, onions, chicken, rice, cooking oil and other products to stock her store and have good products to offer her customers. She is grateful for this opportunity she is getting that will help her very much.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, onions, chicken, rice and cooking oil.

loans.name: Jose Arnoldo

texts.es:
José, de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y su pareja pasa en casa cuidando a su hijo, viven en casa familiar.

José, tiene un pequeño taller de reparación de bicicletas desde hace varios años, lo aprendió debido a la necesidad de
pagar los gastos de la casa, el horario de atención es de 8:00 a.0. a 4:00 p.m.
 
José, utilizara el préstamo para comprar repuestos como llantas, rines y otros materiales que necesita para su trabajo, de esa forma lograra tener más variedad de repuestos.

El sueño de José, es mantener su negocio estable y que sea rentable.
texts.en:
Jose, 24, has a ninth grade education and he lives with his partner who takes care of their son.  Jose has been running a small bicycle repair shop for several years which he learned about to cover household expenses.  His business hours are from 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m.

Jose will use the loan to buy spare parts such as tires and spokes, as well as other materials for his work.  This will give him a varied inventory of parts.

Jose's dream is to keep his business stable and profitable.

loans.use: To buy spare parts like tires, spokes and other materials for his work.

loans.name: Rahim

texts.ru: Рахим жизнерадостный молодой парень в возрасте 23 лет. Он женат но пока у него нет детей. Рахим честный и трудолюбивый человек. Они всей семей живут в сельском районе. Он занимается животноводством вот уже несколько лет и с его доходом обеспечивает свою семью. Рахим в этом деле профессионал. Он планирует расширит свое дело и хочет купать ещё несколько голов скота, но к сожалению у него в данный момент недостаточно денежных средств. Поэтому он обратился в МДО Арванд за получение кредита и заранее благодарит за понимание и поддержку!!!
texts.en: Rahim, age 23, is a happy young man.  He is married but doesn't have any children yet.  He is honest and hardworking.  His entire family lives in the countryside.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for a few years already and supports his family with his income.  He is a professional cattle breeder.  He is planning to increase his activity and wants to buy a few additional head of cattle.  Unfortunately, he doesn't have enough money for this kind of purchase at the moment.  For this reason, he has turned to MDO Arvand and requested a loan.  He thanks them in advance for their understanding and their support!!!

loans.use: to buy some livestock.

loans.name: Cristina Esperanza

texts.es:
En  el sector conocido como La 12 De Marzo  de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúnen  cada quince días las socias  del Grupo De Crédito El Nuevo Paraíso # 1. Lugar de gente humilde y dedicada a la agricultura y al comercio en general.
En este lugar vive la señora Cristina, tiene 20 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen un hijo de 3 años de edad. Su esposo es comerciante. Ella aprendió belleza y arreglo personal en una academia de la localidad hace varios años.
Doña Cristina para obtener sus propios ingresos y con ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos que genera el hogar se dedica a realiza tinturados, cortes de cabellos, pintado de uñas entre  otras cosas, ella trabaja en su casa y a domicilio, sus clientes la llaman para que ella les dé una cita y les pueda realizar sus trabajos, ella está ahorrando todo lo que puede ya que espera en un futuro y con la ayuda de los créditos instalar un salón de belleza.
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar una máquina para cortar cabello, esmaltes y cosméticos que ella utiliza en sus trabajos. Lleva 2 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos son rápidos y le ayudan. Sus sueños son tener su salón de belleza.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank named “El Nuevo Paraíso #1” (New Paradise #1) meets every 15 days in the March 12th neighborhood in the city of Portoviejo. The humble and dedicated people who live in this place engage in agriculture and general trade.

Sra. Cristina lives in this area. She is 20 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has a three-year-old son. Her husband is a merchant. She learned cosmetology and personal makeovers at a local academy a few years ago.

In order to generate her own income and help her husband with the household expenses, Cristina provides coloring, haircuts, nail painting, and other services. She works at her house, but she also makes home visits to customers who call her for an appointment so that they can receive her services. Cristina is saving everything she can because she hopes in the future, along with the help of loans, to open a beauty salon.

This loan will be used to buy hair clippers, nail polish, and cosmetics that she uses in her work. Cristina has been with her Communal Bank for two years and enjoys being a member because the loans are issued quickly and have been helpful. Her dreams include having a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy hair clippers, nail polish, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de chile dulce y elotes, posee 6 años de experiencia en la actividad, vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa y con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el joven vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, productos agroquímicos, etc. para poder seguir con sus cultivos y tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The young man whose face has been pixelated because he is 24 years old and lives in a high-risk zone, has been growing sweet peppers and corncobs for six years; he sells them in different markets near his house and with the profits he obtains he manages to pay some of his household costs. 

The young man lives in his own house with his life partner and he is requesting a loan to buy fertilisers and agrochemical products, etc. to be able to continue growing his crops and have better revenues for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fertilisers, agrochemicals, etc.

loans.name: Mark Frederick

texts.en: Mark Frederick is 18 years old and presently in the second year of college. He is studying Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering. He aims to continue and finish his chosen course so that he will become a professional and find a good job someday. Due to the high cost of school fees, his parents could not afford to finance his schooling. For this reason, Mark Frederick is asking for an educational assistance of 20,000 PHP to pay for his tuition fees, miscellaneous fees and allowances. He is hoping that he will avail his requested amount to be able to continue his studies.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition fees, miscellaneous fees and allowances.

loans.name: Maria Eda

texts.en:
Maria Eda is a hard working mother residing in the town of Talibon, Bohol. She makes and sells pots to the people in her area. She is a married woman with three children aged 9,18 and 19 years respectively. She has been making pots for 10 years now.  

Maria Eda has requested for a loan to buy materials such as clay, paint and wood. These materials will be used in the production of pots. With these, she would be able to cater for the order of her customers. Her income will slowly improve and enable her to prepare a nutritious diet for the whole family.

She dreams to expand her business to make it productive and profitable for the improvement of her livelihood and status.

loans.use: to buy materials such as clay, paint and wood.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Jennifer is 40 years old and has two children who are currently in school.

Jennifer has a buy and sell rice business in the Philippines. Jennifer has requested a loan of 13,000 PHP through NWTF to pay for rice grains and labourers' salaries for her rice mill.

Jennifer has been in this business for 3 years. She would like to save enough money to be able to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to pay for rice grains and labourers' salaries for her rice mill.

loans.name: Grupo Agricola La Lomita Xejuyup Group

texts.es:
Francisco (es el primero del lado izquierdo de la fotografía) es un padre de familia de 40 años de edad, tiene una linda familia de cuatro hijos de las edades entre 1 y 20 años, vive en una comunidad de Sololá.
Dedicado, responsable y persevante es don Francisco que su mayor prioridad es su familia, el para generar sus ingresos y mantener a sus hijos se dedica al cultivo de café, banano y maxan desde hace 20 años, para él esta actividad es bastante productivo porque lo realiza desde muy joven por lo tanto cuenta con mucha experiencia.
Francisco desde hace algún tiempo  había sembrado una parcela de café que en estos tiempos  ya necesitan mantenimiento, pero una de las dificultades que enfrenta Francisco ahora es que no cuenta con suficiente dinero para darle el mantenimiento necesario que el cultivo ahora necesita, pero para no perder la cosecha Francisco ha organizado a un grupo de personas con las mismas necesidades para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para compra de abono orgánico y pago de mano de obra.
Francisco sueña con una tienda de compra y venta de abarrotes y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios para que sean buenos profesionales
texts.en:
Francisco (the first on the left in the photograph) is a 40-year-old family man; he has a beautiful family of four children aged between 1 and 20 years old. He lives in a community in Sololá. Dedicated, responsible and perservering, Francisco's main priority is his family. To generate income and support his children he has been growing coffee, banana and maxan leaves for over 20 years. For him this business is sufficiently productive because he has been doing it since he was young and so has a great deal of experience. 

Some time ago, Francisco sowed coffee on a plot of land, which now needs upkeeping, but one of the difficulties that Francisco now faces is that he doesn't have enough money to do the required maintenance that the crop now needs. So to ensure that he doesn't lose his harvest, Francisco has organised a group of people with the same needs to request a loan that will be used to buy organic fertiliser and pay labourers. Francisco's dream is to have a shop for purchase and sales of groceries and  to continue supporting his children in their studies so that they become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy organic fertiliser and to pay labourers to upkeep his coffee crop

loans.name: Natalia Marina

texts.es:
Natalia es una joven mujer de 20 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos y estudia la carrera de medicina en la universidad.
Ella es inteligente, dulce, tierna, alegre, feliz, responsable y trabajadora. Sus estudios los realiza en la zona central un área caracterizada por edificios que albergan oficinas comerciales, públicas, restaurantes plazas y toso tipo de comercio, de clima frío y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 4-16 grados centígrados.
Natalia es de tez morena trigueña, cabello negro largo lo usa suelto, ojos pardos, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que ya no habla y habla español por cultura general y por la carrera que estudia. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que es propia y está construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina, cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Ella estudia la carrera de medicina se encuentra en 2 año de 5 que dura la profesión y tiene mucha vocación, mucha voluntad para estudiar, un muy buen estómago, y una gran memoria para acordarse de todo. “decidí trabajar para solventar mis gastos estudiantiles, vendo ropa de dama y estudio en mi puesto de venta…” comenta. Su sueño es trabajar como médico y realizar una profesión, ella desea realizar el pago de las cuotas de sus materias y comprar libros de anatomía. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que estudia y trabaja.
Es por esos motivos que Natalia solicita un préstamo para pagar las cuotas de sus materias y comprar libros de anatomía para continuar con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Natalia is a 20 year old woman. She is single and has no children. She is studying medicine at college. She is intelligent, sweet, soft-hearted, cheerful, happy, responsible and hardworking. She studies in a central area characterized by buildings that contain commercial offices, public offices, restaurants and all types of businesses. It has a cool and dry climate with a temperature that varies during the day between 4-16 degrees celsius. 

Natalia has golden brown skin, long black hair that she wears loose, brown eyes, short stature, and a thin build. Her mother tongue is Aymará, which she doesn't speak anymore. She speaks Spanish for the general culture and for her studies. She lives in her parents' house which they own and which is built of bricks and cement with a sheet metal roof. It has potable water, electricity, and plumbing. She studies medicine and is in year 2 out of 5, which is how long the major is. She has a lot of vocation and desire to study, a very good stomach, and a great memory to remember everything. “I decided to work to pay for my education expenses. I sell women's clothes and I study where I sell..." she says. Her dream is to work as a doctor and practice the profession. She wants to pay for her classes and buy anatomy books.  This is her first loan cycle with the institution during the 2 years she has been studying and working.

For these reasons, Natalia is asking for a loan to make payments for her classes and buy anatomy books to continue with her education.

loans.use: to pay for her classes and to buy anatomy books to continue her education.

loans.name: Grupo Sector Sapon Group

texts.es:
Manuela una madre de familia de 52 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de 3 hijos de las edades entre 24 y 36 años, viven en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Manuela (la primera del lado izquierdo de blusa con flores rosadas) es amable y sincera, ella para generar sus ingresos se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica de su región, ella ya tiene 5 años de realizar esta labor, vende en varios lugares circunvecinas de su comunidad.
Manuela vende ropas típicas bonitas y que duran mucho es por eso que durante los cinco años ha logrado mucha clientela que la busca constantemente por su producto, pero ella ahora se ha dado cuenta que necesita surtir mejor sus trajes, pues ahora han salido otros estilos de ropas típicas y colores modernos, por lo que ella debe meter estos nuevos productos para abstener las necesidades de la clientela, pero ella lamentablemente no cuenta con el capital suficiente, para realizar esta inversión, por tal motivo ella ha organizado a  un grupo de personas para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para comprar blusas cortes y fajas para luego venderlas a un buen precio.
El gran suelo de manuela es poder realizar esta inversión para mejorar sus ingresos
texts.en:
Manuela is a 52 year old wife and mother. She is married and has a beautiful family of 3 children, aged 24 to 36 years old. They live in a community of  Suchitepéquez.

Manuela (the first on the left with a flowered blouse) is kind and sincere. To generate her income, she buys and sells traditional clothing of her region. She has been doing this work for 5 years and she sells in several areas around her community.  

Manuela sells pretty, traditional clothing that lasts a long time. That is why, during the last five years she has earned a lot of customers who seek her out constantly for her products. Now she has realized that she needs to diversify her clothing more, because now there are other styles of traditional clothing and modern colors. She has to have these new products to meet her customers' needs, but unfortunately, she doesn't have enough capital to make this investment. For that reason, she has organized a group of people to ask for a loan which she will use to buy blouses and girdles to later sell them at a good price.

Manuela's big dream is to make this investment to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase energy saving stoves and solar lights at wholesale price

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase energy saving stoves and solar lights at wholesale price

loans.name: Fanny Edith

texts.es:
Recinto San Juan de Puerto Quito un lugar de clima cálido húmedo su gente es amable y muy trabajadora, en este Recinto sus habitantes son muy unidos y todas las tardes organizan encuentros deportivos, para fortalecer sus lasos de amistad 
En este recinto vive y tiene el negocio la señora Fanny una mujer luchadora de 49 años, ella viene de familia de bajos recursos económicos y siempre tuvo que luchar muy duro para salir adelante  es madre soltera tuvo una relación pero no dio resultado y se divorció, de esta  tuvo 2 hijos que ya son mayores de edad he independiente 
Ella se dedica a la producción de cerdos y pollos, aprendió de este negocio por iniciativa propia, al mismo le dedica un promedio de 8 horas por día, solicita el crédito para invertir en la ampliación de las chancheras
Con esta nueva inversión incrementara la producción de cerdos y sus ingresos económicos, la señora Fanny  agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por en apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas
texts.en:
The town of San Juan de Puerto Quito is a place with a warm, humid climate. Its people are kind and very hardworking. In this town, the residents are very united and every afternoon they organize sporting events to fortify the bonds of friendship. 

In this town Fanny lives and has her business. She is a woman who is a fighter and she is 49 years old. She comes from a low income family and she has always had to fight very hard to get ahead. She is a single mother who had a relationship but it didn't work out and she got divorced. From that relationship, she had 2 children who are grown and independent. 
 
She works raising pigs and chickens. She learned this business on her own initiative. She works an average of 8 hours a day. She is asking for the loan to invest in expanding the pig sties. With this new investment, she will increase the amount of pigs she raises and her income. Fanny is grateful to the  Fundación Alternativa and to Kiva for the support and the opportunities offered.

loans.use: to invest in expanding her sties.

loans.name: Judith Angelica

texts.es:
Judith es una señora de 35 años de edad, es casada tiene una hermosa familia de 3 hijos de las edades entre 15 y 21 años, viven en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Judith con el afán de apoyar a su esposo con los ingresos de la casa, ella trabaja para una farmacia que funciona en una de las principales calles de su comunidad, esta labor ella lo realiza desde hace 3 años, gracias a Dios con lo que le gana a logrado mantener a su familia.
Judith es una madre que se preocupa por las necesidades de su familia, es por eso que ahora se ha dado cuenta que su casa necesita de una remodelación, porque ya tiene algunos años por lo que se ha ido deteriorando poco a poco, lamentablemente ella no tiene la posibilidad de comprar los materiales necesarios, para poder remodelar la casa, pero ella con el deseo de realizar este cambio, ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizara para comprar cemento, cal, arena y hierro.  El gran anhelo de Judith es poder mejorar su casa para que su familia tenga un mejor, lugar donde vivir.
texts.en:
Judith is a 35-year-old woman, married, and has a lovely family of 3 children between the ages of 15 and 21. They live in a community of Suchitepéquez.

Judith, with the desire to support her husband with the household income, works for a pharmacy that is on one of the main streets of her community. She has done this work for 3 years, thanks to God, with what she earns she has managed to support her family.

Judith is a mother who is concerned about her family's needs. For this, she now has realized that her house needs remodeling, since it is some years old and it has been deteriorating little by little.  Unfortunately, she does not have the possibility to purchase the necessary materials to be able to remodel the house but with the desire to make this change, she has decided to ask for a loan that will be used to purchase cement, lime, sand, and iron. Judith's great desire is to be able to improve her house so that her family has a better place to live.

loans.use: to purchase cement, lime, sand and iron to remodel her house.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria estudia y trabaja, es de la ciudad de Caacupé, a la vez que estudia también trabaja, ella pretende lograr su objetivo con ayuda de la Fundación Paraguaya, con el préstamo que pide, ya que con él quiere pagar las cuotas de su universidad y comprar libros.
Ella tiene su negocio consistente en una carnicería en la cual trabaja todos los días. Es una persona muy trabajadora y sacrificada.
texts.en:
Maria goes to school and works and is from the city of Caacupé. While she is a student, she also works. She plans to achieve her objective with the help of Fundación Paraguaya, with the loan she is requesting since, with it, she wants to pay university fees and purchase books.

She has consistent business in a butcher shop where she works every day. She is a very hard-working and self-sacrificing person.

loans.use: to pay university fees and purchase books.

loans.name: Cinthia Alexandra

texts.es:
El cantón se llama así en honor de la Virgen del Carmen. Posee una considerable riqueza en flora y fauna, siendo una de las fuentes principales de ingreso el cultivo del plátano de la variedad Barraganete.
En este lugar vive la señorita, Cinthia tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y vive en un departamento arrendando.
Doña Cinthia para obtener sus propios ingresos hace varios años instalo cerca del departamento donde vive un salón de belleza, en el cual realiza diversidad de trabajos como tinturados, cortes de cabellos, pintado de uñas entre  otras cosas. Trabaja todos los días desde las 8h00 hasta las 17h00 y a veces hasta más tarde si sus clientes requieren de sus servicios. Además también vende productos de belleza y productos naturales,  el cual lo hace al mismo  tiempo cuando realiza sus otros trabajos.
Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar tintes y secadoras de cabellos. Lleva  con el grupo  de Crédito 1 año y  es la presidenta del grupo, le gusta por el apoyo de la fundación a las mujeres que quieren y necesitan emprender un negocio.  Su sueño es llegar a tener un SPA.
texts.en:
The canton is named in honor of the Lady of Carmen. It has a considerable richness in flora and fauna, and one of the primary sources of income is growing Barraganete variety plantains. 

Cinthia lives in this place. She is 22 years old, single, and lives in a rented apartment. 

Cinthia, to get her own income, some years ago established a beauty salon near the apartment where she lives, in which she does a variety of work such as dyes, haircuts, nail polish, and other things. She works every day from 8:00 to 5:00 and sometimes later if her customers need her services. In addition, she also sells beauty products and natural products, which she does at the same time as she does her other work. 

This loan will be used to purchase dyes and hair dryers. She has been in the communal bank group for 1 year, is the president of the group, and likes it for the foundation's support of women who want and need to undertake a business. Her dream is to be able to have a spa.

loans.use: to purchase dyes, and hair dryers.

loans.name: Sonia Enermila

texts.es:
Sonia, de 40 años de edad, con alto espíritu de trabajo y vocación para desenvolverse plenamente en la sociedad, estudio hasta bachillerato con mucho esfuerzo, está acompañada y su pareja trabaja de vigilante  en una empresa, tiene 4 hijos, su hija mayor estudia en la universidad.

Sonia, realiza los oficios domésticos y cuida de su hijo menor, ademas se ocupa de un pequeño negocio que tiene, en donde vende productos básicos para el consumo familiar.- Se dedica a estas actividades desde hace mucho tiempo, pero dispone de un poco de tiempo para poder realizar otra actividad.

Con el fin de diversificar su negocio ha tomado la decisión de optar por un crédito para comprar una vaca, para obtener productos lácteos, es por esto que han acudido a una institución financiera, para que les otorgue un crédito. Con el financiamiento se les ayudará en muchos aspectos, entre los cuales está, el ingreso extra por sus ventas y la disposición de alimento en su familia.  

Sonia, desea que sus hijos estudien a nivel superior universitario, además de mejorar su negocio y extenderlo para obtener mas ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Sonia, 40 years old, with a strong working spirit and vocation to function fully in society, completed secondary school with a lot of effort. She is partnered and her partner works as a guard in a business. She has 4 children, her oldest daughter is a university student.

Sonia does the household chores and takes care of her younger child, in addition, she takes care of a small business she has, where she sells basic pantry products. She has worked at these jobs for a long time, but has a little time to be able to do another job.

With the end of diversifying her business, she has decided to take a loan to purchase a cow, to get dairy products. For this, she has approached a financial institution so they could grant her a loan. With the financing, it will help her in many ways, among which are the extra income from her sales and the availability of food for her family. 

Sonia wants her children to go to school through university, in addition to improving her business and expanding it to get more income.

loans.use: to purchase a cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, manure, corn seeds and beans certified for planting.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca madre de 2 dos jóvenes de las edades entre 18 y 24 años, uno de ellos ya lo apoya con los ingresos de la casa, y el otro está estudiando, ella vive junto a su esposo en una comunidad de Suchitepéquez.
Francisca es una mujer muy trabajadora, ella para obtener sus ingresos y poyar a su esposo con el mantenimiento de la casa se dedica a la crianza de una diversidad de animales como: pollo, cerdos, esta actividad ella lo realiza desde su casa, es por eso que también le da tiempo a realizar otra actividad, y ella para no perder tiempo cultiva cacao en un lugar circunvecino de su comunidad.
Francisca desde hace algún tiempo se ha dado cuenta que su familia carece de terreno por lo que ella ahora ha tomado la decisión de solicitar un crédito que lo invertirá para la compra de media cuerda de terreno, para que sus hijos tengan donde cultivar más adelante.
El gran sueño de Francisca es poder comprar más terreno para sus hijos
texts.en:
Francisca has two children, aged 18 and 24. One of them helps her with the home expenses, and the other one is in school. She lives with her husband in the community of Suchitepéquez.

Francisca is a hardworking woman. She raises different animals, such as chickens and pigs, in order to generate some income and help her husband to support their family. She works at home, and this is why she can have other activities. In order not to waste her time, she grows cocoa close to where she lives.

Francisca realized some time ago that her family needed to have a piece of land. She has now decided to request a loan and buy a plot of land, so that her children can use it to grow food in the future. Her biggest dream is to be able to buy more land for her children.

loans.use: to buy a plot of land to grow food.

loans.name: Divina Diolaguita

texts.es:
El cantón el Carmen es reconocido por sus platos típicos como los bolones de queso, maní y chicharrón, el seco de gallina y la “guanta” (animal que se cría en las montañas). Su variedad de cultivos: plátano barraganete de exportación, frutas tropicales (piñas, bananas, maracuyá, etc.)
En este lugar vive la señora Divina, tiene 51 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres  hijos de 29, 22 y 17 años de edad, los dos mayores son independientes y el menor le ayuda a su mamá en el negocio. Ella vive en casa alquilada.
Doña Divina con la finalidad de contar con sus propios ingresos se dedica a la venta de  arroz por quintales en una bodega de acopio de Arroz, dos de sus hijos le ayudan a la comercialización del arroz, trabajan todos los días de 7h00 a 17h00  o mas según las temporadas, su forma de venta es en el local donde llegan los comerciantes, a ella le  encanta vender y esto lo viene realizando desde hace veinte años en los que le ha ido muy bien ya que tiene bastante clientela. 
Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar arroz por quintales a buen precio. Tiene dos ciclos en la fundación y le agrada el apoyo a todas las mujeres que desean ser independientes en sus negocios. El sueño es tener más bodegas de acopio de arroz en diferentes partes del
texts.en:
The Carmen canton in Ecuador is well-known for its typical dishes, such as cheese, peanut and pork scratching balls, chicken soup, and “guanta” (an animal that is bred in the mountains). The area has a variety of crops, including the barraganete plantain which is exported, and tropical fruits (such as bananas, pineapples and passion fruit). 

And it is here in Carmen that 51-year-old Divina lives. She is a single mother to three children, ages 29, 22 and 17 years old; the eldest two are independent while the youngest helps his mum with her work. The family lives together in rented accommodation.

In order to earn her own income, Divina works selling rice by the hundredweight at a rice warehouse. Two of her children help to sell the rice, working from 7am until 5pm, or longer, according to the season. Divina sells at the warehouse where traders come to buy it. Divina loves her job and has been doing it for 20 years. This work has gone very well for her as she has quite a few customers.

Divina will use this loan in order to buy hundredweights of rice at a good price. She has been with Fundación Espoir for two cycles and is grateful for all the support provided to women who want to be independent in their business. Divina’s dream is to have more shops to sell rice in different parts of the country.

loans.use: to buy rice.

loans.name: Cinthia

texts.es:
Cinthia tiene como meta poder desarrollar su propia empresa, que podrá emprender por medio de los conocimientos que ha adquirido por medio de su carrera. Ella está estudiando la carrera de análisis de sistemas.
Ella está luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida, y ayudar a su familia por medio de ello. Se esfuerza bastante para poder lograr sus objetivos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a poder seguir luchando por sus metas y sueños.
texts.en: Cinthia's goal is to be able to develop her own company, which she will be able to achieve through the knowledge she has acquired with her career. She is studying the career of System Analysis. She is working hard to improve her life situation and help her family. She makes a lot of effort to reach her goals. She is requesting this loan to pay for tuition fees, and in this way to continue working hard for her goals and dreams.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition fees.

loans.name: Thalia Joselyn

texts.es:
El cantón El Carmen se destaca en la agricultura, se cultiva el plátano barraganete, café, cacao, maíz y gran variedad de frutas (piñas, naranjas, maracuyá, etc.). En la ganadería se destaca la cría de ganado vacuno, equino, porcino y aves de corral.
En este lugar vive la señora, Thalia, tiene22  años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo de 2 años. El cónyuge es chofer y trabaja en el Oriente, viven con los suegros.
Doña Thalia es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos para ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa por catálogo y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja tres días a la semana de dos a tres horas al día, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene algún tiempo que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien,  lo que más vende son los perfumes y cosméticos.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa, cosméticos y una vitrina pequeña para exhibir productos que vende.  Este es el segundo ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gustan los créditos emergentes. Sus sueños son tener casa propia ya que vive es con sus suegros.
texts.en: Canton El Carmen is important in farming. "Barragenete" type bananas, coffee, cocoa, corn and a great variety of fruits (pineapples, oranges, passion fruits, etc) are grown here. In animal husbandry, beef cattle, pork and poultry are very important. Thalia, 22 years old, lives here with her domestic partner with whom she has a 2 year old son. Her partner is a driver and works in the East. They live with her in laws. Thalia is a housewife who earns her own money to help her husband with household expenses by selling clothes and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes and women accessories) by catalog. She works three days a week from two to three hours a day. She leaves her products on a loan basis and collects payment every week. She has worked in this job for some time, and it is going very well. What she sells more are perfumes and cosmetics. She will use this loan to buy clothes, cosmetics and a small showcase to exhibit the products she sells. This is the second cycle in the Credit Group, and she likes the emerging loans. Her dream is to have her own house, because now she is living with her in laws.

loans.use: to buy clothes, cosmetics and a showcase.

loans.name: Jarley Gregorio

texts.es:
A el cantón el Carmen se la denomina “La Puerta de Oro de Manabí”, por su producción de plátano barraganete, único en el país y exportado al mundo.
En este lugar vive el señor Jarley, tiene 19  años de edad, soltero y vive con sus padres.
Don Jarley quiere dedicarse a la cría de pollos, tiene un pequeño espacio en su casa para hacer una granja, él  trabaja de recepcionista en un hotel en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Shachilas, con un horario de 20h00 a 8h00 ( horario nocturno) en el día tiene tiempo para  dedicarse a la cría de pollos los cuales los criaría  durante dos o tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya estén listos para la venta, y de esta forma ganaría dinero desde su casa,  su mamá también le ayudaría en este negocio.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pollos, alimentos y medicinas para los mismos. Es su tercer  ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y está muy contento ya que lo créditos emergentes le han ayudado en sus necesidades económicas. Su sueño es tener un  un negocio independiente y ser el su jefe.
texts.en:
The Carmen canton is Ecuador is also known as the “Golden Gate of Manabí [province]” and produces the barraganete plantain, unique to Ecuador and exported around the world.

Nineteen-year-old Jarley lives here. He is single and lives with his parents.

Jarley wants to earn a living raising chickens. He has a small space at home to keep the animals. He currently works as a night-shift receptionist in a hotel in the city of Santo Domingo de la Shachilas from 8pm to 8am. He therefore has time during the day to raise the chickens. He will look after them for two to three months, after which time they will be ready to sell. This work will allow Jarley to make a living from home. His mother will also help him with this work.

Jarley will use this new loan to buy chickens and feed and medicines for them. This is Jarley’s third loan cycle with the group and he is very happy as previous loans have helped him with his financial needs. Jarley’s dream is to own his own business and be his own boss.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed and medicines for them.

loans.name: Mónica Yasmina

texts.es:
El cantón el Carmen se destaca por la agricultura, se cultiva el plátano barraganete, café, cacao, maíz, palmito y gran variedad de frutas. En la ganadería se destaca la cría de ganado vacuno, equino, porcino y aves de corral.
En este lugar vive la señora, Mónica tiene 30 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos de 13, 11, 8 y 3 años. El cónyuge es jornalero. Viven en una finca donde ellos cuidan.
Doña Mónica se dedica a la cría de aves de corral, tiene una pequeña espacio en la finca donde cuida, ella en temporadas compra una gran cantidad de pollos los cuales los cría durante dos o tres meses que es el tiempo para que ya estén listos para la venta, después de este tiempo los entrega a algunas tiendas en la localidad o también vende por libras por su casa y en pie a comerciantes, también tienen cultivos de ciclo corto y les ha ido bastante bien ya que es una forma de ganar algo desde su casa.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pollos, alimentos, medicinas y en hacer un galpón para los pollos. En el Grupo De Crédito esta hace dos ciclos  y está muy contenta porque  le han ayudado mucho los créditos emergentes. Su sueño es poder ahorrar y así poder tener su casa propia.
texts.en: Canton El Carmen is important in farming. "Barragenete" type bananas, coffee, cocoa, corn, palm and a great variety of fruits are grown here. In animal husbandry, beef cattle, pork and poultry are very important. Monica lives here. She is 30 years old. She and her domestic partner have four children who are 13, 11, 8 and 3. Her partner is a daily laborer. They live in a farm they take care of. Monica works raising poultry animals in a small space they have at the farm they take care of. In season, she buys a large quantity of chickens that she raises during two or three months, which is the time needed to be sold. After this time, she sells them to some stores in her area or by weight from her house, or to merchants. She also has some short cycle crops, and she is doing very well because it is a way of earning some income from home. She will use this new loan to buy chickens, chicken feed, medicines, and to build a barn for the chickens. She has been two cycles in the Credit Group, and she is very happy because the loans have helped her very much. Her dream is to be able to save, and in this way to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy chickens, chicken feed, medicines, and to build a barn for the chickens.

loans.name: Enso Eduardo

texts.es:
El cantón El Carmen es gran productor y exportador de plátano y cacao, sus habitantes además se dedican a la ganadería. El clima es cálido húmedo.
En este lugar vive el señor Enso,tiene 19  años de edad, soltero y vive con sus padres que son agricultores.
Don Enso se dedica a la limpieza en una compañía en Santo Domingo, el horario de trabajo es de 18h00 a 23h00(horario de la noche) y por las mañanas estudia, para él es un poco difícil estudiar y trabajar pero el esfuerzo valdrá la pena. También le gustaría  criar  aves de corral ya que tiene espacio en la casa de sus padres, él tiene tiempo por la tardes para esta actividad a mas que sus padres le ayudaran y es una forma de tener ingresos adicionales.
Este nuevo crédito lo va utilizar en comprar pollos, alimentos y medicinas. Es su segundo ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito le gusta la fundación porque ayuda a los emprendedores a salir adelante con sus negocios.  Su sueñoes terminar sus estudios  y aplicar en la policía nacional y ser un buen policía.
texts.en: The El Carmen canton produces and exports large quantities of bananas and cocoa. The locals also work in cattle rearing. The area has a hot and humid climate. 19-year-old Enso is single and lives in El Carmen with is parents, who are farmers. Enso is a cleaner in a company in Santo Domingo, where he works from 6-11 pm, and studies in the morning. It is not easy for him to combine study and work but the effort is worth it. He would also like to breed poultry as he has the space to do so in his parents' home. He has time for this during the afternoon and can count on his parents' help because this would be a way of earning extra income. he will use this new loan to buy chickens and food and medicine for them. It is his second cycle in the Credit Group. He likes the foundation because it helps entrepreneurs to develop their businesses. HIs dream is to complete his studies, to join the police force and be a good policeman.

loans.use: to buy chickens and food and medicine for them.

loans.name: Mario Alfredo

texts.es:
Mario es un hombre de 39 años tiene una familia de 5 hijas de las edades entre 2 y 21 años, viven en Suchitepéquez. Es un padre de familia muy optimista y perseverante, este humilde hombre para generar sus ingresos y mantener a su familia, tiene en su domicilio el servicio de nixtamal desde hace 20 años, gracias a este pequeño negocio ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos.
Mario se ha dado cuenta que con el paso de los años los molinos sean desgastado mucho por el constante uso que se les da día a día, por lo que él ha tomado la decisión de comprar un nuevo, para que sus clientes no se vean afectados, por algún desperfecto que se pueda presentar en un futuro, pero una de las dificultades que tiene Mario es que no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para poder realizar esta compra, por tal motivo el solicita un préstamo de Q 6,000.00 para comprar un nuevo molino de nixtamal.
Mario sueña conseguir crecido con su negocio comprando más molinos y prestar un mejor servicio a la comunidad.
texts.en: 39-year-old Mario lives in Suchitepéquez with his family of 5 daughters aged between 2 and 21. He is a very optimistic and perseverant man. He is also a humble man who, for 20 years, has had a cornflour mill in his home, which has enabled him to generate an income and support his family. It is through this small business that he has managed to support his children. Mario has come to realise that, as the years go by, mills get very worn out by daily use and that is why he has taken the decision to buy a new one.  This will mean that his customers will not suffer as a result of any problem which might occur. However, one of Mario's problems is that he does not have enough money to purchase one and so he is seeking a loan of 6,000.00 quetzals to buy his new mill. Mario dreams of being able to continue to expand his business by buying more mills and offering a better service to the community.

loans.use: To buy a cornflour mill

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.es:
Cynthia  es estudiante de la carrera de fisioterapia, actualmente trabaja como ayudante en una escuela. Vive con sus padres y hermanas, ellos la apoyan mucho en su carrera. 
Ella quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas por medio de su profesión y de sus conocimientos. Es una persona que se esfuerza mucho por sus  sueños y anhelos.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder cumplir sus sueños.
texts.en:
Cynthia is a student of physiotherapy and she currently works as an assistant at a school. She lives with her parents and her sisters, who support her a lot in her studies. She would like to be able to help others through her profession and her knowledge. 

She is a person who works hard for her hopes and dreams. She is requesting this loan to pay her university fees, and in this way achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Olimjon

texts.en: Olimjon is a hardworking man who is 42 years old. He lives with his family in Shahrituz district. Olimjon has engaged in agriculture for many years. His wife helps him. Also, he is a master at construction. Olimjon wants to purchase cattle and start his new business, but he does not have enough money. He hopes for Kiva lenders' support. Olimjon really needs your kindness and understanding. From the profit, he would like to improve the life condition of his family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle and start his new business

loans.name: Ada

texts.es:
Ada tiene 59 años, vive en casa familiar con una hija discapacitada a su cargo. Ada cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales. De familia unida. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería. Ubicada en el distrito de Zaña, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú.

Ada se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en generalcomo arroz, azúcar, café, entre otros, desde hace más de 05 años aproximadamente. El destino del préstamo es para capital de trabajo, pues desea realizar la compra de una cantidad mayor de mercadería para poder diversificar y aumentar su stock de productos, y de esta manera satisfacer las diferentes necesidades y preferencias de sus clientes, lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Ada is 59 years of age. She lives in her family home and has a daughter with a disability who she cares for. Ada has good personal and employment references. She is from a close family. She lives in a community which makes a living from trade, farming and raising cattle. It is located in the district of Zaña, in the Chiclayo province, in the region of Lambayeque on the north coast of Peru.
Ada has earned a living selling general groceries such as rice, sugar and coffee for more than 5 years. The loan will be used for working capital, as she wishes to purchase a large amount of merchandise in order to be able to diversify and increase her stock of products to supply the various needs and preferences of her clients. This will allow her to improve her earnings in the short term, to increase her profits and therefore improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of merchandise

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.en:
Gulbahor is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1975. She is living in the southern part of a country in a village. She is a widow, and she has one child. She has 10 years of experience doing business. She is a doctor. She is working in a medical clinic. She is well known among doctors and friends. 

Gulbahor got sick. She needs to be treated. She is asking for a loan for treatment. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to pay for medical expenses

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda, is aged 53, is married to a farmer and they're blessed with four children. She has owned and managed a vegetable production business in their village for almost 10 years, and earns a net income of PHP 400 weekly. Her net profit is usually spent on the needs of her hog raising business, so that she can generate more income. 

Due to insufficient capital in her business, she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 12,000 to purchase seedlings, fertilizer, and insecticides to use on her vegetable production business.

loans.use: To purchase seedlings, fertilizer, and insecticides to use on her vegetable production business.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma is a married woman from the town of Likoni who has seven children who all don't attend school because they are adults; she owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. She has operated a food cafe in downtown Likoni, selling to the neighbors and passersby. She defines herself as a person who always strives to the maximum to attain what she wants. 

Fatuma is asking for this loan to purchase cereals, wheat, maize flour and cooking oil. 

She is grateful for this opportunity that she is getting that will help her very much.

loans.use: to purchase cereals, wheat, maize flour and cooking oil

loans.name: Rukia

texts.en:
Rukia is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over six years she has operated an open air food selling business, selling from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the Kshs 50,000, Rukia wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves, and cooking fat

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan está estudiando la carrera de derecho, quiere ser un buen profesional que ayude a las demás personas, es por ello que se está esforzando cada día.
A la vez que estudia también está trabajando, es una persona muy dedicada y por sobre todo sacrificada. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello poder estar cada vez más cerca de poder cumplir con su meta de ser alguien en la vida.
texts.en: Juan is studying law at university. He wants to be a good professional who helps others, and for that reason he works hard everyday. While he is studying he is also working. He is a very dedicated person and above all self-sacrificing. He is requesting this loan to pay his course fees, and in this way be a step closer to achieving his goal of being someone in life.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan dice que su meta es llegar a ser Profesional y seguir creciendo en lo laboral, está estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, y por medio de sus estudios quiere realizarse como persona y profesional.
Está esforzándose bastante para poder crecer y se alguien en la vida, y también poder ayudar a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para que pueda pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello estar cada vez más cerca de cumplir con su meta. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con sus sueños y anhelos.
texts.en:
Juan says his goal is to be a professional and keep growing in his work.  He's in the accounting program and he wants to be fulfilled personally and professionally.  He's working very hard to grow and be someone in life, as well as to help his loved ones.

Juan's requesting this loan so he can pay the fees for his program.  That way he'll be closer to realizing his goal.

He's grateful for this opportunity to continue with his dreams and aspirations.

loans.use: to pay his university fees

loans.name: Esteban Juvenal

texts.es:
Esteban tiene 40 años de edad, vive en casa alquilada de material rústico junto a su esposa y sus 02 hijos en el distrito de Pucará que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La comunidad donde vive es una pequeña zona rural donde los habitantes se conocen y se dedican principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la venta e instalación de paneles solares, cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y sus clientes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo lo utilizará para invertir en la compra de una mayor cantidad de paneles solares para incrementar su negocio. Esta inversión le permitirá ganancias para mejorar su condición económica y por ende invertir en mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Esteban is 40 years of age. He lives in a rental house made of rustic materials with his wife and their 2 children in the district of Pucará which is located in the province of Jaén in the Cajamarca region, in the northern mountain range of Peru. The community where he lives is a small rural area where the inhabitants know one another, and where people make a living from farming, trade and raising cattle.

He earns a living selling and installing solar panels. He has experience in this business and his clients provide good personal and professional references about him. He will use the loan to invest in the purchase of a large number of solar panels to grow his business. This investment will provide him with income to improve his economic situation and consequently invest in better living conditions.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of a large number of solar panels to grow his business.

loans.name: Turgunboy

texts.en:
Turgunboy is a master of construction. He is 29 years old. He lives with his family in Shahrituz district. Currently, his life condition is not good. That's why Turgunboy wants to start his new business. He would like to purchase two cattle for his business. His difficulty is lack of finances. 

For this reason, Turgunboy applied for a loan. He hopes that after getting the loan, he will be able to live better with his family. Turgunboy would like to increase his business. In the future, he wants to continue the partnership with Humo. Turgunboy thanks you in advance.

loans.use: to purchase two cattle and start his new business

loans.name: Juvenaray

texts.en:
Hello world! Meet Juvenaray, a farmer in the Nkubu region of Kenya. Juvenaray runs a one-acre mixed farm where he keeps a dairy cow, four goats and 12 heads of poultry. With use of an irrigation system, Juvenaray is also able to grow crops, including banana, on the farm.
 
Due to growing financial obligations, Juvenaray is looking for ways to increase his family's income. He is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to purchase a generator. The generator will produce electricity, which will be used in powering machines and equipment such as water pumps and chaff cutters. 

The value created by this investment will push his rural enterprise to the next level of growth. Additional income resulting from your investment will enable Juvenaray to meet financial needs of his wife and four children.

loans.use: to buy a generator.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stocks of soft drinks, snack foods, beverages, seasonings and  laundry soaps to resell.

loans.name: Dionisio

texts.en:
Dionisio is 53 years old, married and has a child. His wife manages a store for income. Dionisio also manages a rice field for income. In the field, he plants and harvests rice to sell. 

He wants to improve crop production in his business but has insufficient funds to sustain his crops. That is why he is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his crops. He hopes to achieve a good harvest in his rice field to become successful in the farming business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for his crops.

loans.name: Segundo Eliseo

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 24 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito es tranquila y sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería principalmente.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte en su mototaxi, realiza esta actividad desde hace 03 años, contando con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. Solicita préstamo para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento de su moto ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Segundo espera poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Segundo is 24 years old. His lives with his partner and has one child under his care. He lives in a family home in a rural area in the district of Oyotún, in the province of Chiclayo, located in the Lambayeque region of the northern coast of Perú. 

Life is tranquil in this region. The principal sources of work for people are agriculture, business and livestock. 

For the past three years he has offered a transportation service with his “mototaxi”. He is experienced in this line of work, and has a dedicated pool of customers who give him very good personal and professional references.

He is seeking a loan to repair and maintain his motorcycle, since it is currently in poor condition. With this loan, Segundo hopes to be able to offer better service to his customers, which will in turn generate more income and improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his motorcycle taxi, which is currently in poor condition.

loans.name: Saumu

texts.en:
Saumu is a married woman with two children who attend school and are under her care. She lives at her own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

For over three years, she has operated a clothes-selling business, selling from door to door and from home to her neighbours and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase a bale of children's clothes for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase a bale of children's clothes for resale.

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha is a married woman with two kids, both of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Mwanaisha operates a grocery vegetable selling stall. She sells at the market to town dwellers and neighbors. The challenge she faces is the high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

With the 20,000 KES she wants to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes, and onions to resell. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, 2 crates of tomatoes and onions to resell.

loans.name: Limbikani Group

texts.en:
Naomi is 33 years old and has three children in her custody. Naomi used to be a farmer and obtaining loans helped her to start up a new business. She now owns a grocery store in her community that she depends on for her daily needs and her children’s welfare. 

She started this business in order to be economically empowered and independent. She will use the loan to expand her business by purchasing more commodities for her shop.

She plans to hire someone to help her in running her business and hopes to open a wholesale business. The loans have helped her to become independent and she is now able to pay the school fees for some of her children.

loans.use: to purchase assorted stock for her grocery store.

loans.name: Victor

texts.pt:
Nasceu em Namaacha Província de Maputo tem 31 anos de idade, vive maritalmente pai de 2 filhos menores de idade, todos frequentam a escola, não responsabiliza-se por ninguém.
É Docente N3 a mais de 5 anos onde aufere um valor que aplica nas despesas da sua casa. Sendo criador solicita um empréstimo para satisfazer os seus clientes adquirindo pintos, ração e vitaminas. Este é o seu 4º empréstimo na Hluvuku.
Futuramente pretende ampliar o volume do seu negócio de criação de frangos e dar continuidade com os seus estudos até ao nível superior.
texts.en:
Victor was born in Namaacha, in the Maputo Province of Mozambique. He is 31 years old and lives with his wife and 2 children, both of whom are in school. He is not financially responsible for anyone besides his family.

Victor has worked as a teacher for more than 5 years, earning a salary that he uses to cover household expenses. Because he also raises animals, he is asking for a loan to buy chicks, as well as chicken feed and vitamins. This is his 4th loan with Hluvuku [Kiva Field Partner].

In the future, Victor would like to expand his chicken-raising business and also continue his university studies.

loans.use: buy chicks, feed and vitamins

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es:
Liliana esta estudiando la carrera de derecho, es una persona que esta poniendo todo de si para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Ella quiere poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de sus conocimientos, y es por ello que se esta esforzando para lograrlo.
Ella comenta que su anterior préstamo de kiva lo uso en poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y con ello pudo cubrir esa necesidad que tenia y poder seguir estudiando. Ella pide hoy nuevamente este préstamo para cubrir sus cuotas y seguir con sus anhelos y sueños. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en: Liliana is studying law. She is a person who is putting everything into improving her living conditions and that of her family. She wants to be able to help her loved ones through her knowledge and this is what she is striving to do. She comments that the previous loan from Kiva was used to be able to pay her tuition fees. Thus she was able to cover this necessity and continue with her studies. She is currently requesting a new loan to pay her tuition and continue with her yearnings and dreams. She is grateful for the opportunity she is receiving to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.en:
Gulnora is a business woman. She was born in 1973. She is from southern part of Tajikistan. She is married. Her husband is a trader. She has three children. 

For almost 15 years she has has a business trading fruits in the domestic market. She is a capable, communicative and kind person. She lives in a district where it not easy to do a business. She has a lot of competitors in market. She tries her best to be compatible and offers fresh fruits for attracting more clients. 

She requested a loan for enlarging her activity by buying different fruits. She hopes that would be supported by Kiva.

loans.use: to buy different fruits to sell.

loans.name: Zaida

texts.es:
Zaida es de la ciudad de Villarrica, esta estudiando la carrera de Psicología clínica, ella por medio de ese conocimiento quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas.
Se esfuerza cada día para poder  mejorar sus condiciones de vida para ganar mejor, y mejorar la calidad de sus seres queridos.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su universidad y seguir estudiando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: Zaida is from the city of Villarrica. She is studying Clinical Psychology. She wants to be able to help other people through this knowledge. She makes an effort each day to improve her living conditions to make more and improve the quality of living for her loved ones. She is requesting this loan to pay her university tuition and continue to study as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university tuition.

loans.name: Qori Ttica Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco  comunal QORI TTICA, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Maranura, provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Vicentina tiene 03 hijos es conviviente y tiene 47 años de edad, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de agricultura, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
 La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Vicentina  belongs to the Qori Ttica communal bank, which is located in the Maranura district of La Convención province in the department of Cusco. 

She is 47 years old and in a common-law relationship. She has three children.

She alternates her daily activities with her farming business. She has been in this business for a good while now, and it is going well thanks to her daily efforts.  She also works raising small animals. She wants to be able to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.

Vicentina is requesting the loan to buy compost and seeds. She is grateful for this loan, and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural needs such as fertilizers and insecticides used in maintaining his crops

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a 41-year-old mother who has only one child. Due to financial hardship, she engages herself in retailing rice and vegetables within their locality. 

She aims to increase her income in order to satisfy their necessities and support the education of her child. Due to capital insufficiency, she would like to avail herself of an additional of 5,000 PHP to buy more stock of the said products to resell. She is hoping that this financial assistance will be a great help for her to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of rice and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hog feeds, vitamins and vaccines for her hogs

loans.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene is a 37-year-old widow from Leyte, Philippines. She has three children. Mylene runs a small business selling home-cooked foods to the people in her place. Mylene also earns an additional income through a hog-raising business. Mylene has been in the business for more than eight years now.

Mylene is asking to take a loan to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, condiments, cooking oil, rice, and soda. A loan will help her improve her business as well as her income.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, condiments, cooking oil, rice, and soda

loans.name: Delia

texts.es:
Delia tiene 52 años de edad, es conviviente, tiene 01 hijo dependiente económicamente; vive con su hijo y su conyugue en el distrito de Pucará, distrito mediano con aspiraciones a superarse; en dicho distrito la población se dedica a la agricultura siendo el cultivo de arroz el de mayor producción, así como al comercio en general. El distrito de Pucará está ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

Delia se dedica a la cría y comercio de ganado porcino y también a la cría de animales menores como son gallinas, patos, entre otros; lo que Delia realiza es la venta de las crías de su ganado, dichas ventas son realizadas en su domicilio y en el puerto de Chiple; dicha actividad la viene realizando hace más de 06 años, Delia cuenta con un corral amplio para dicha actividad y cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales por parte de sus vecinos.

El destino del crédito es para invertir en su negocio, realizando la compra de animales para criarlos, engordarlos y luego venderlos, aumentando y diversificando de esta forma su stock de animales, lo que le permitirá atender a todos los gustos de su público consumidor; generándole de esta manera una mejora en sus ingresos, aumento en sus ganancias y por consecuente en su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Delia, age 52, lives with her common-law husband and a dependent son in the district of Pucará, which is a medium-sized district with a desire to grow. The local people here are involved in agriculture, mainly growing rice, and also in general commerce. The Pucará district is located in the Jaén province, in the Cajamarca Region, in the northern highlands of Peru.

Delia raises and sells pigs and small animals such as chickens and ducks, among others. Delia sells the offspring of her livestock out of her home and in the port of Chiple. She has been in business for over six years and has a large barnyard for her activity. She has very good personal and work references from her neighbors. 

She will use the loan to invest in her business and buy animals to raise, fatten, and sell. She wants to increase and diversify her stock of animals in order to meet consumer demand. This will improve her income and increase her profit, which will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise, fatten, and sell.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is thankful that she was granted a 18,000 PHP loan which she used to purchase various kinds of cleaning agents. Her earnings helped support her family and meet their daily basic needs.

She would now like to apply for a 20,000 PHP loan which she will use to buy boxes of cleaning products such as dish washing liquid, fabric conditioner, laundry soap, and powder detergent. Her income as a dealer helps cover her family’s daily needs. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment and the financial assistance for it will surely cover their everyday needs and support her children's education.

Angelina dreams to put up a factory to manufacture her own cleaning products to grow her business. She aims to send all her children to college to allow them better opportunities in life. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for products such as dish washing liquid, fabric conditioner, powder detergent, and other products for her retail business.

loans.name: Ramona

texts.en:
Ramona used her previous loan for 10,000 PHP loan to purchase supplies and merchandise products for her direct selling business. Her earnings support her family and meet their daily basic needs.

Ramona requested another loan for 10,000 PHP, which she will use to buy footwear, undergarments, shampoo, cologne, and deodorant needed in her business. Her income from direct selling helps cover her family’s daily needs. She hopes for a good return on her investment to fund her family's everyday needs and support her children's education. Ramona dreams of operating a store to display her products and attract more customers. She aims to send all her children to college to provide them with better opportunities in life. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work every week and draw strength and inspiration God. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, footwear, undergarments, and cosmetics

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to construct a fence

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cereal products to resell

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit is a taxi driver from Kapan town of Syunik region. He works at a local mining company 15 days in a month, and for the rest of the month, he drives a taxi using his own car. 

Davit lives with his mother and brother. He has now applied for his loan to purchase a damaged car and use its spare parts. He will be able renovate and improve the working condition of his car and continue his taxi-driving business. 

His loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This program provides business start-up loans to informal businesses that do not qualify through normal channels.

loans.use: to pay for damaged car to use spare parts

loans.name: Crispiora

texts.en: This loan of $800 will allow Crispiora to send her youngest daughter, Filomena, to university. The loan will be used to pay for tuition and school supplies. Crispiora loves her daughter very much and hopes that further education will help her to have a brighter future.

loans.use: to pay for school supplies and tuition for her daughter.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria viene de una familia muy luchadora, con el esfuerzo y sacrificio de sus padres, ha ido alcanzado sus metas.
Ella está haciendo un Posgrado en Reeducación en postural Global, con lo que quiere ir abriéndose camino y mejorar sus conocimientos para poder ayudar a los demás.
Está contenta por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir mejorando y creciendo. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera, y con ello poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
