texts.en: Sawuda is 33 years old, the mother of two children who are five and ten years old and enrolled in school, and the leader of this loan group. The group is called URUMULI, which means “the Light” in English. The members sell different products and want to expand their businesses so they can have a better future. Sawuda sells clothes and has been in a business for the past eight years. She has requested a loan to buy more shirts, skirts and shorts to sell. She will use the money made from this loan to expand her business and buy food for her family.

loans.use: to buy more clothing to sell.

loans.name: Lusine

texts.en:
Lusine lives in Kapan city of Syunik region. She has run her clothes trading business at a rented stall here for eight years. At her stall she sells women and children’s clothes, and also jeans for both women and men. Lusine brings her stall’s merchandise from Yerevan once a month in a rented car. She mentions that it wastes a lot and she manages to use only a little part of income for her family's needs. 

Lusine is married and she has two daughters; her elder daughter is married and she lives with her family, the smaller daughter lives with her parents and she works as a salesgirl. With the coming of spring, Lusine hurries to renew her stall’s assortment of clothes with a spring season collection. She asks for this loan and will be very thankful to Kiva lenders if they help her to buy a new collection of spring season clothes for her customers, the number of which is really great.

loans.use: to buy a new spring season clothes collection for her customers, the number of which is really great.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is a diligent, 27-year-old, smallholder Kenyan farmer from Cheplanget village. Rose's main income source is milk from her dairy farm. Rose is planning to diversify her agri-business to include crop cultivation. Diversifying into horticultural farming serves not only to increase her income and spread business risk but also to complement dairy farming. Byproducts from dairy farming such as manure will be used to plant crops, while crop byproducts such as stalks will be used to feed cows and lay their bedding. 

For Rose to get the horticultural farm going, she needs external financing to cover initial high costs of resources such as labor and farm inputs. She is seeking a KES 50,000 loan investment from Kiva lenders to venture into horticultural farming. With your loan, she is going to pay for labor, farm tools, and farm inputs such as seeds and fertilizer. Increased income from investment will enable Rose to meet her family's basic needs.

loans.use: to venture into horticultural farming.

loans.name: Jose Geronimo

texts.es:
José, requiere un nuevo financiamiento para construir un corral para cerdos, comprara cemento, arena y tubos, de esa manera estará fortaleciendo la crianza la porqueriza.
Con el financiamiento anterior a dado un mejor cuido al ganado y las ganancias obtenidas han sido invertidas en iniciar la comercialización de cerdos. José logro construir su casa para dar a su familia un techo digno.
texts.en:
Jose needs new financing to construct a corral for his pigs. He will purchase cement, sand, and water lines, and in this manner, strengthen his pig-raising business.
 
With previous financing, Jose has improved his cattle-raising efforts, and the earnings obtained have been invested in initiating the sale of pigs.

Jose has also managed to construct his own house, providing his family with a worthy roof over their heads.

loans.use: buy cement, sand and water lines to fortify his pig-raising business.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es:
Marco tiene una historia sorprendente, Él es un hombre de 61 años de edad, soltero, mantiene la sorprendente cantidad de 7 hijos, y es esta cantidad lo que lo llevo a tomar una medida desesperada para mantenerlos.

Por necesidad económica, por sus hijos, por su futuro, por tener alimento para comer, quiere solicitar un préstamo para Iniciar formalmente un negocio que será un carnicería, necesita de tu apoyo, pues no cuenta con mucho capital debido a la enorme responsabilidad que pesa sobre sus hombros, apóyalo Marco te necesita.
texts.en:
Marco has a surprising story. He is a 61 year old man, single, who needs to support the surprising number of 7 children. This alarming number made him take a desperate measure so he can support them, because currently, he has no employment. 

Because of financial need, his children, his future, and in order to have food to eat, he is requesting a loan to formally start a business of a butcher shop. As one can see on the picture, he has been working already in one, but he needs your support, because he does not have much capital, due to his huge responsibility. Support Marco, he needs you.

loans.use: to start a business of a butcher shop to support his 7 children.

loans.name: Yohana Isabel

texts.es:
Yohana, a sus 26 años de edad, es una mujer carismática, activa y servicial. Ser madre de dos hijos, fue el principal motivo para luchar incansablemente día a día, buscando alternativas para ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a sus hijos. 

Desde hace aproximadamente 1 año, comenzó a fabricar y comercializar calzado para todo tipo de clientes, de muy buena calidad y a excelentes precios, lo que le permitió darse a conocer en el sector y lograr una buena trayectoria. 

Trabaja todos los días durante 5 horas con sola.
Esto la impulsa a solicitar el apoyo del crédito para fortalecer sus inventarios, pues comprará materia prima como pegas y tela, así podrá satisfacer la demanda que aumenta en esta temporada escolar, esto le ayudará a mejorar los ingresos que percibe por su labor. 

Yohana manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir haciendo lo que le apasiona, por ello siempre se propone nuevas metas y entre ellas está el de convertirse en una gran distribuidora de calzado y generar oportunidades de empleo, así podrá mejorar la calidad de vida y el bienestar tanto de su familia, como la de aquellas personas que le ayuden a realizar su labor diaria.

Anímate a prestar al negocio de Yohana!
texts.en:
Yohana, 26, is a charismatic, active and helpful woman.  Being the mother of two children is the principal motive for her to struggle tirelessly day after day seeking alternatives in order to make a living and bring sustenance to her children.
Approximately one year ago, she began to make and sell footwear of very good quality and at excellent prices to all kinds of customers, which permitted her to become known in the area and achieve a good trajectory.
She works for five hours a day by herself.
This has impelled her to request the support of a loan to fortify her inventory.  She will buy raw materials such as fasteners and cloth.  In this way, she will be able to satisfy the demand which increases in the school season.  This will help her improve the income she realizes from her work.
Yohana shows that her age does not impede her from continuing to do what she has a passion for and for which she always proposes new goals. Among them is the one to become a great distributor of footwear and generate employment opportunities.  In this way, she will be able to improve the quality of life and well-being both for her family as well as for those people who help her with her daily work.
Make a loan to Yohana's work!

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as fasteners and cloth.

loans.name: Peter's Group

texts.en: Peter is the proud 47-year-old father of seven children. He is a group leader, often described as very friendly, and represents his group of 10 farmers in the Webuye District. Since joining the One Acre Fund in 2012, Peter has earned more profits from each harvest. He described his most recent harvest as very good, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with the One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing two solar lights, in addition to fertilizer and maize, because he will now have light during dark hours for his children to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school. With this loan, Peter’s group will be able to plant 6.5 acres of land and buy seven solar lights.

loans.use: to buy two solar lights and access cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer to grow maize.

loans.name: Kenys Javier

texts.es:
Kenys es un padre muy joven de tan solo 22 años de edad que por iniciativa propia, por necesidad de mantener a su pequeño de 2 años y a su pareja emprendió un negocio de venta de calzado, no cuenta con un local, solo con amigos, familiares, y sus pies para ir tocando puerta a puerta ofertando sus productos. 
Sueña con tener un local, iniciar a vender ropa, ofrecer empleo y porque no comprar una vivienda para vivir junto a su ahora familia.
Kenys quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de surtido de calzado, su idea es ir a pueblos y veredas buscando negocios firmes, una de sus principales impedimentos es una incapacidad pero eso lo dejo de lado la responsabilidad de alimentar a su familia esta primero y aspira a tener tu apoyo para hacerlo.
texts.en:
Kenys is a father at only 22 years old. In order to look after his 2 year-old son and his partner he used his initiative and started up a business selling shoes. He does not have a shop, only friends, relatives and his feet to help him go from door to door offering his products.  

He dreams of having his own shop, of starting to sell clothing, of offering other people jobs and of buying a house where he can live with his family. Kenys wants to ask for a loan to buy merchandise to stock his shoe business. His plan is to go to towns and villages looking for stable businesses. One of his main obstacles is a disability but he puts this to the side in order to take on the responsibility of feeding his family, for which he hopes to have your help.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock his shoe business and meet the needs of his family.

loans.name: Suglo Mbori Buni - Tampion Group

texts.en:
Afishetu is a 50-year-old, hardworking woman from Tampion in the Northern region of Ghana. Afishetu is married and has two children. She is the individual pictured with her hand raised among members squatting.

Afishetu is a member of a Shea butter processing group that has been in business for the last four years. The name of the group is ‘Suglo Mbori Buni - Tampion’. Afishetu earns a good profit from the business, as the group has been trained by Grameen Ghana on improved Shea butter processing, so that the business can always produce premium quality butter for the local and export markets.

Afishetu and ‘Suglo Mbori Buni - Tampion’ have asked for a loan of GHS 9,900. Her share of the loan is GHS 400, which would be used to buy Shea nuts for processing. Afishetu aspires to earn more income, as well as to repay this loan and support her family with food and school fees. She thanks Kiva lenders for their support and love.

loans.use: to buy Shea nuts for processing.

loans.name: Joyce's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Joyce, who as a group leader is representing her group formed by 13 farmers in Webuye District, Kenya. She is married and is a mother to four children. She is known in her community as a very reliable person.

Initially, Joyce joined One Acre Fund in 2010 because she wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since she joined the program she says that her life has improved, especially because she has had more profits from each harvest. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Joyce plans to send her children to school.

Between the 13 farmers in Joyce's Group, a total of 10 acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light. So with this loan, the group will also receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Jeison Arley

texts.es:
Jeison desde muy temprana edad aprendió el oficio de confección de ropa gracias a su mamá que toda su vida fue confeccionista y fue así como poco a poco Jeison empezó a entender y aplicar estos conocimientos.
Es un joven emprendedor y siempre dispuesto a atender a sus clientes de la mejor manera.

Se siente muy agradecido con todo lo que ha podido construir hasta ahora con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar.

Madruga todos los días para trabajar en sus negocio durante 9 horas.
El pide un apoyo económico para comprar insumos de confección como tela, hilos y agujas.

Tiene muchas esperanzas en su negocio y conserva la ilusión de tener un taller mucho más grande en el que pueda ofrecer empleo y aumentar sus clientes.
texts.en:
Thanks to his mother, Jeison learned the trade of making clothes at a very early age.  His mother was a seamstress all of her life.  That is how, little by little, Jeison started to understand and apply this knowledge.

He is an enterprising young man, and he is always ready to tend to his customers in the best way.  He is very grateful for all that he has been able to build so far with the help of the Interactuar corporation.

He gets up early every day in order to work at his business for nine hours.

He is requesting financial help to buy supplies for sewing.  He will buy things like fabric, thread, and needles.  He has a lot of hopes for his business.  He dreams of having a much bigger workshop in which he will be able to offer employment and increase his customers.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies like fabric, thread, and needles.

loans.name: Voahanginirina

texts.fr:
Mère de famille, 33 ans, Voahanginirina est épicière depuis déjà 17 ans. Elle a 3 enfants de 15, 12 et 5 ans dont tous scolarisés.
Elle travaille dure car à part l'épicerie, elle s'occupe aussi de la maison et des enfants. Quant à son mari, il fait le suivi de leurs cultures vivrières à la campagne.
Les deux époux se soutiennent mutuellement dans l'exercice de ces activités pour que la vie de la famille soit tranquille et harmonieuse.
En, fait elle rêve d'acheter même un bout de terrain et d'y construire sa propre maison , comme ça , elle n'aura plus à payer des loyers et les stresses diminuent.
texts.en: Voahanginirina, aged 33, is a mother and has been a grocer for 17 years already. She has three children, aged 15, 12, and 5, all in school. She works hard, since, apart from the grocery store, she also takes care of the house and children. As for her husband, he continues to grow staple crops in the countryside. The couple support each other in these businesses, so that family life may be quiet and harmonious. Voahanginirina dreams of buying a bit of land on which to build her own house. In this way, she will no longer have to pay rent,  thus lessening her stress.

loans.use: to purchase canned drinks, cookies, rice flour, and sugar

loans.name: David

texts.es:
El Sr. David es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, tiene 31 años, proviene de una familia muy trabajadora y con buenos principios.
El mismo es técnico de Refrigeración, toda su familia se dedica a ese ramo, su Papa es uno de los pioneros en este ramo de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo.
Se independizo hace dos años abriendo su propio local de refrigeración, manifiesta que le va muy bien ya tiene muy buena clientela formada. 
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar una congeladora, lo cual le será muy útil en su negocio de refrigeración. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en:
David is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. He is 31 years old, and he comes from a family who works very hard and has high moral standards.

He is a refrigeration technician. All his family works in this trade. His father is one of the pioneers of the trade in the city of Coronel Oviedo.

He became independent two years ago when he opened his own refrigerator repair shop. He says that the business is going very well because he has already built up a very good customer base.

He is requesting a loan to buy freezers which will be very useful in his cooling business. He grateful for the opportunity to continue growing.

loans.use: to purchase freezers.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven quien es transexual y se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 24 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 3 años, con las venta que obtiene logra salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, el joven vive en casa propia con su tía, el quiere mejorar su vivienda cambiando el portón y las ventanas pero como no tiene de suficiente capital por esa razón solicita nuevamente un crédito a INTEGRAL pero esta vez es para la compra de laminas, balcones, hierro y pago de mano de obra y así él y su tía puedan vivir más seguros.
texts.en: The young woman's face has been blurred because she is 24 years old and lives in a high-risk area. She has been selling clothes for three years. With her sales she manages to meet household expenses. She lives with his aunt in her own house. She wants to improve his home by changing the gate and the windows but since she doesn't have enough capital she is again requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral, but this time to buy metal sheeting, security bars, metal, and to pay workers, so that she and his aunt can live safer. She is trannsexual that's why she has a man's name but she is described as a woman.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, security bars, metal, and to pay workers.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es: Ana de 67 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hija quien trabaja y el ayuda económicamente, ella se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos (maíz y frijol)  adicional a eso también vende tamales, se dedica a la actividad del cultivo desde hace 30 años, y esa experiencia le ha dado la oportunidad de tener buenas cosechas, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde reside y tiene muchos clientes, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, pesticidas, entre otras cosas que le servirán para sus cultivos, así obtendrá mejores ganancias para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 67 years old. She lives in her own house with her daughter who works and helps her financially. 

She cultivates basic grains (corn and beans) she also sells tamales. She has been in the farming field for 30 years. Her experience allowed her to obtain  a good harvest, to commercialize her products in the area where she lives, and she also has many customers. 

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, and pesticides among others things that she'll use for the crops. She'll get a better income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, and pesticides among other things.

loans.name: Leyli

texts.en:
Leyli is 58 years old and she lives in Vanadzor city of Lori region. Leyli is married; her daughter is married already and her son is still a student. Leyli’s husband is a constructor and he works by order. This allows him to also help his lovely wife in her business of trading women shoes, which she has run already 15 years. 

She works at a rented stall at the city wholesale market. Leyli unfortunately had great difficulties in her business during the winter period.  She sold very little of the assortment that she prepared for sales. Now she has a great lack of money, and it means that she is not able to buy new spring season shoes to sell. She hopes that she will receive this Kiva loan, and she will manage to buy fashionable shoes for the spring season, the profits of which she needs to pay for her stall and also to cover her family’s needs.

loans.use: to buy fashionable shoes for the spring season.

loans.name: Anzhela

texts.en:
Anzhela lives with her big family in the village Norashen of the Gegharkunik region. She is a mother of 4 children; her two daughters are married already, her elder son lives and works abroad and helping his family from afar, and her youngest son is passing his military service at the army. 

With her husband, Anzhela has run the farming and agriculture for 20 years. For many years this has been the only source of income for their family and together this couple works day and night to provide good living conditions for their family. Their farm has cows, a calf, a bull, a horse, and sheep. Anzhela's plot of land is not as cute as her cattle in the farm and on her land she cultivates a lot of potatoes, beans, greens, and tomatoes. With the help of her husband, she sells all of her farm products, milk, some meat, and her land’s vegetables at the city’s wholesale market. This loan of 400.000 AMD will help her to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer, diesel fuel, and also animal fodder for all of her farm cattle.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings, fertilizer, diesel fuel, and also animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra es una mujer muy capaz, muy aterrizada, ella ejerce el papel de padre y madre, tiene los pantalones y la responsabilidad para hacerse cargo de su hogar, lo más importante para ella es nunca dejar pasar a sus hijos necesidad, sus dos pequeños de 16 y 4 años de edad representan todo para ella y con su venta de mercancía como lo es ropa y acolchados  genera el sustento para alimentarlos, darles un techo, vestimenta y educación.
Su trabajo de vendedora lo empleo empíricamente ante la necesidad de ganar dinero, ella se encontraba sin trabajo y con la nevera vacía.
Ahora que inicio y se ha ido involucrando más con esta actividad que le gustado, está soñando y anhelando tener un local para vender. 
Sandra solicita un préstamo para la compra de blusas, camisas, camisetas, abrigos, blue jean y acolchados. 
Ella espera seguir generando el estudio para sus hijos y en un futuro poder comprar una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Sandra is a very capable and down-to-earth woman who carries out the roles of both a mother and father.  She has the self-sufficiency and responsibility to manage her home.  The most important thing to her is to never let her children go without necessities.  Her two younger children, 16 and 4 years old, are everything to her, and with her merchandise sales such as clothes and bedding, she generates the resources to feed them and to give them a roof over their heads, clothing, and an education.

She started her work as a merchant from experience because she needed to earn money.  She had no money and an empty fridge.  Now that she started and has become little by little more involved with this profession that she enjoys, she dreams and aspires to have a site for her sales.  Sandra is requesting a loan to purchase blouses, dress shirts, t-shirts, sweaters, jeans and bedding.  She hopes to continue providing an education for her children and to be able to buy her own house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, dress shirts, t-shirts, sweaters, jeans and bedding

loans.name: Tubikeshimana Group

texts.en: Jean Nepo leads this group. He is 55 years old, married and the father of seven children who range in age from 17 to 35. The group is called TUBIKESHIMANA, which means God's Wish in English. The members sell different products and want to expand their business to give their families a better future. Jean sells coffee and has been in this line of work for the past 35 years. He has requested this loan to buy more coffee to sell. He will use the profits he makes from his business to pay school fees for his children and renovate his house.

loans.use: to buy more coffee to sell.

loans.name: Guido Alfonso

texts.es:
Guido un joven admirable, trabajador, que quiere triunfar, quiere dejar su huella en el mundo a sus 19 años de edad es independiente, con su fábrica de calzado, su idea es mejorar su negocio, tener empleados aunque es joven tiene experiencia y con sus conocimientos quiere llevar su empresa al siguiente nivel.
Guido quiere solicitar un préstamo para la compra de telas, hilos, pegamento y suelas, ya que son la materia prima para elaborar sus productos. Con su préstamo tendrá insumos para trabajar y seguir generando capital para ayudar en los gastos de su hogar y seguir soportándose su estudio.
texts.en:
Guido is an admirable young man, a hard-worker who wants to triumph, who wants to leave his mark on the world. At 19 years old, he is independent, with his shoe-making business. His idea is to improve his business and to have employees. Although he is young, he is experienced and with his knowledge he wants to bring his business to the next level.

Guido wants to ask for a loan to purchase fabric, thread, adhesive, and soles, since they are his raw materials to make his products. With his loan, he will have income to work and continue generating capital to help support the household expenses and continue paying for his schooling.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, thread, adhesive and soles.

loans.name: Marino

texts.es:
Marino se ha dedicado a la carpintería gran parte de su vida, pues desde muy temprana edad inició trabajando como empleado en algunas carpinterías y ebanisterías donde aprendió a realizar la actividad. Marino al ver que su negocio estaba muy mal remunerado decidió independizarse y montar su propio taller de carpintería donde gracias a la buena calidad de sus trabajos ha podido tener una gran cantidad de clientes. 
 
Trabaja con 1 familiar durante 8 horas 6 dias.

Marino se encuentra casado y es padre de 3 hijos, a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso. 

Debido a que tiene dificultades de capital, Marino ha tenido que rechazar algunos pedidos de sus clientes por la poca capacidad para conseguir las materias primas necesarias. 

Con el ánimo de mejorar esta condición, Marino aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como madera, pegante, clavos, entre otros, para la fabricación de grandes pedidos de sus clientes. 

Marino aspira que el préstamo le permita elaborar estos pedidos sin que se afecten sus ingresos mensuales. 

Además, Marino espera que el negocio le genere ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecerles a su esposa y sus 3 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Marino has been a carpenter for most of his life, since he began working for carpenters and cabinetmakers at a young age, which is where he learned the craft. 

Marino noticed that the business he was working for was not paying well, so he decided to go independent and set up his own carpentry workshop where thanks to the good quality of his work he has been able to attract a large number of customers. He works with a relative, for eight hours a day, six days a week.

Marino is married with three children, for whom he has always wanted to be able to offer a better quality of life and better opportunities to progress.

Due to money difficulties, Marino has had to turn down some customers' orders as he would not have been able to acquire the necessary raw materials.  With the intention of improving the situation, Marino hopes that a loan will make it possible for him to buy raw materials such as wood, glue, nails and others, to fulfill his customers' orders.

Marino hopes that the loan will allow him to build these orders without affecting his monthly income. He also hopes that the his business will generate enough income to offer his spouse and three children a better quality of life and new opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as wood, glue, nails  etc.

loans.name: Andres

texts.es:
La falta de capital ha generado una enorme preocupación en la vida de Andrés un hombre dedicado en cuerpo y alma a la agricultura que necesita como comprar insumos para el sostenimiento e inicio de sus cultivos, la cosa es que un préstamo en ese lugar solo se conseguía con personas fuera de ley que cobran interés enormes, pero con la ayuda de Interactuar Andrés puede tener una luz de esperanza para seguir ejerciendo la actividad con la que prácticamente nació.
Andrés se encuentra solicitando un préstamo para comprar semillas, abonos y riegos de momento solo puede pagar esto pues no cuenta con mucho capital, pero se compromete en hacer crecer su negocio y aunque es un hombre solo y no tiene en quien apoyarse saldrá adelante.
texts.en:
The lack of capital has produced a great worry in the life of Andrés, a man who is dedicated in body and soul to agriculture and who needs to buy supplies to sustain and begin his plantings. The problem is that a loan in this place can only be obtained from people who operate outside of the law and who charge enormous interest, but with the help of Interactuar, Andrés can have a light of hope to continue doing the work into which he was practically born.

Andrés is applying for a loan to purchase seeds, compost, and irrigation. At the moment he can only pay this, since he doesn't have much capital, but he commits himself to making his business grow, and even though he is a single man and doesn't have anyone to lean on, he will advance.

loans.use: to buy compost, irrigation, and seeds, since his business is now in decline, and he wants to revive it again.

loans.name: Yurani Fernanda

texts.es:
Yurani es una joven de 21 años de edad la cual tiene una gran responsabilidad es madre de dos hijos uno de 6 años y otro de 18 meses, junto con su pareja que es también muy joven hace lo posible por trabajar y darle una buena calidad de vida, de momento Yurani tuvo que olvidarse del estudio y ejercer una actividad.
Ella se desempeña como criadora de aves, tiene pollos de engorde, con dicha actividad genere los recursos necesarios para cuidar de sus hijos.
Solicita un apoyo para ampliar sus corrales comprar pollos e iniciar con la cría de gallinas y la venta de huevos.
Ayuda a esta joven que sueña con sacar su negocio adelante y cuando sea más rentable y sus hijos hayan crecido un poco retomar los estudios
texts.en:
Yurani is a 21 year old young woman with a great responsibility, she is the mother of two children, one 6 years old and another one of 18 months. Together with her partner who is also very young they do everything possible to work and give them a good quality of life.  For the time being, Yurani had to stop going to school in order to work.

She makes a living raising birds, she has fattening chickens and with that she generates the necessary resources to take care of her children. She asks for help to expand the animal pens, purchase chickens and start to raise hens and sell eggs.

Help this young woman get her business ahead so that when it is profitable, and her children grow she can continue with her studies.

loans.use: to buy chickens and in order to start selling eggs she needs to buy 10 hens.

loans.name: Mariz Victoria

texts.es:
Mariz se encuentra muy feliz, llena de energías y se siente muy agradecida ya que está a un solo paso de cumplir uno de sus sueños gracias a la corporación interactuar, como lo pueden ver en el cartel está ofreciendo emprendimiento entre los usuarios de zonas afectadas y una de las beneficiarias es Mariz que con este proyecto iniciara su propio de negocio de panadería.
Mariz para culminar su gran sueño pide un pequeño apoyo para realizar adecuaciones a su local ubicado en su hogar, comprara insumos y algunas herramientas ya que como era fanática de esta actividad tiene varios implementos en su hogar
texts.en:
Mariz is very happy, full of energy and grateful to Corporación Interactuar, as she is only a step away from meeting one of her goals. As seen on the poster, Interactuar is offering entrepreneurship services to users in the area and Mariz is one of its beneficiaries. She plans to start her own bakery business. 

Mariz is asking for support to accomplish her big dream and to make improvements to her store, which is located in her house. She will buy ingredients and some utensils. Being an enthusiast of this activity, she already have some tools at home.

loans.use: to officially start her bakery business, making improvements to her store and buying ingredients and utensils.

loans.name: Owildeny De Jesus

texts.es:
El Señor Owildeny es un hombre muy juicioso y aplicado, siempre en busca del bienestar para su familia y de un correcto desarrollo para sus hijos.

Siempre ha querido ser independiente y es por eso que pide ayuda para la compra de un carro de comidas e ingredientes para la preparación de comidas rápidas para la venta.

Apoya a un hombre entregado a su familia!
texts.en: Owildeny is a very level-headed and diligent man. He is always looking out for the well-being of his family and for a correct development of his children. He has always wanted to work on his own and it is for this reason that he is requesting help to buy a food cart and supplies to prepare fast food for sale. Support a man who is devoted to his family.

loans.use: to buy a food cart and ingredients for the preparation of fast food for sale.

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre muy trabajador de 32 años de edad, padre de una pequeña de 5 años por quien lucha todos los días para darle una mejor calidad de vida, se desempeña como confeccionista a terceros, tiene contratos que en el momento el alcanza para vivir, pero no ha podido ir a buscar algo más por falta de maquinaria y es que no cuenta con capital para comprar una maquina plana que es lo que necesita, por ello quiere solicitar un préstamo para comprarla, también comprara insumos.
El préstamo para Luis será muy importante porque con ella tendrá un ahorro de tiempo de producción suficiente para comprometerse con las fechas de entrega que le exigen.
Su sueño es tener un taller grande confección con 10 0 15 operarias.
texts.en:
Luis is a hardworking man who is 32 years of age. He is the father of a five-year-old daughter, so he strives every day to provide her a better quality of life. His work involves fulfilling third-party sewing contracts so that he can earn enough to make a living. However, he is not able to obtain additional work because he lacks machinery. Luis does not have the capital to buy a tabletop sewing machine that he needs. Therefore, he is requesting a loan in order to buy one, as well as supplies.

Luis’s loan is very important because it will help to reduce production time and enable him to commit to his existing deadlines. His dream is to have a large sewing workshop with 10 to 15 employees.

loans.use: to purchase a tabletop sewing machine and sewing supplies so that he can improve his production time.

loans.name: Mercedes Rosa

texts.es:
Mercedes es una mujer con un proyecto ambicioso de montar una miscelánea, dicho proyecto necesita de un capital bastante alto el motivo es que ella no tiene nada, necesita construir su local, pintarlo, comprar estanterías, vitrinas, computador, exhibidores, surtido de ropa y productos como accesorios.
Ella opto por el emprendimiento por la falta de oportunidades en la sociedad, depende de su apoyo para tener un negocio con el cual quiere sostener su familia conformada pro un hijo y dejar de ser una desempleada más.
Sueña con tener su apoyo para construir su futuro a partir de su negocio.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a woman who is pursuing an ambitious project of opening a variety store. This project requires a fairly large amount of capital, which she doesn’t have. She needs to build her shop, paint it, buy shelves, displays cases, a computer, display racks, an inventory of clothes, and other products such as accessories.

Mercedes chose this business because of the lack of opportunities in society. She is relying on the support of Kiva lenders to open this business, which she wants to start in order to her sustain her family. Mercedes has a son and does not him to be unemployed as well.

She dreams of gaining your support so that she can build her future business.

loans.use: to build and paint her shop, as well as buy shelves, display cases, a computer, display racks, and an inventory of clothes and accessories.

loans.name: Jane's Group

texts.en:
Jane is a 54-year-old, proud mother of 10 children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of 13 farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Jane has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Jane described her harvest as good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel, and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to buy a cow.

With this loan, Jane’s Group will be able to plant a total of 9 acres of land and purchase a total of 6 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Marie Nostha

texts.en:
Marie Nostha was one of Zafen’s success stories in marketing this year. Thanks to her first loan, she generated revenues to change the labels of all her products.

She studied economics at the Haitian State University for four years, opened her small business in mid-2007, and used part of her revenue to sponsor a street-cleaning activity in her neighborhood.

Today, she needs a new loan to take her business to the next level by acquiring two grinders and raw materials for products. In addition to increasing production quantity, this acquisition also will increase the number of employees and reinforce her presence on the market.

This project is pre-funded by PADF up to 25%.

loans.use: To buy 2 grinders to process food products and some raw materials

loans.name: Patrick's Group

texts.en: Patrick has been a farmer for more than 20 years. Although he is pictured alone, he is representing his group of nine farmers who live in the Webuye District of Kenya. Patrick has always been described as very friendly, which is largely why he was selected to be the group's leader. He started working with the One Acre Fund for the first time in 2013, and this year he decided to not only get farming supplies from the group but also to buy two solar lights as part of his loan. He is very excited about this new addition, as now he will be able to have light during dark hours for his children to study. He also can’t wait to repair his home using the profits he earns in this coming season. Patrick’s Group will be able to plant a total of six acres using the farming supplies obtained with this loan, and will also receive a total of four solar lights.

loans.use: to buy two solar lights and hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: 3 De Febrero Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “3 DE FEBRERO” iniciará el décimo segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Eva es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de frazadas, servicio de transporte, venta de pinturas, venta de jugos, venta de alcohol, venta de salchipapa, venta de dulces. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Eva es integrante, ella indica que hace seis años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de salchipapas (aperitivo tradicional nocturno); da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió al observar el amplio mercado que tiene este productos en los mercados paceños. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de papa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “3 DE FEBRERO” communal association is starting its twelfth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación. It is comprised of eight members and is directed by a table of directors, of which Eva is President. The members of the communal association work in various different businesses, which include: blanket sales , transport services, painting sales, juice sales, alcohol sales, "salchipapas" (street food) sales and confectionery sales. 

The loan they are taking out will benefit small micro-businesswomen such as Eva. She joined Pro Mujer six years ago after being invited by a friend who is a customer of the institution. She currently has a business selling "salchipapas" (a traditional night-time snack). She learned this business after observing that these products have a wide market in La Paz. 

The loan that she is now taking out will be used to increase her stock (by buying potatoes from a wholesaler) which she will get from the wholesalers in the city of La Paz and will later sell in her stall. This work allows her to provide resources to support her family economically, as she is married and has two children.  

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she liked the health area that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy potatoes at a wholesaler's

loans.name: Mujeres En Acción De Fhiladelfia Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Mujeres En Acción De Fhiladelfia”. La cual  está constituida por 08 socias emprendedoras y entusiastas. Vanesa de 33 años de edad es separada con dos hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica  a la venta de hamburguesas. Su mayor deseo es tener su local propio  para que pueda seguir progresando. Solicitó el crédito para la compra  de panes, carne, pollo lechuga y aceite. El grupo “Mujeres En Acción De Fhiladelfia” agradece a todas las personas que facilitaron este crédito. Vanesa es la tercera del lado derecho ella se encuentra sentada, viste polo rosado pantalón blanco y cartera blanca.la señora Yajayra no se encuentra en la foto,ya que por motivo de trabajo no pudo asistir.
texts.en:
This is the group 'Mujeres En Acción De Fhiladelfia' (Fhiladelfia Women in Action). It is made up of 8 enterprising and enthusiastic members.

Vanesa is 33 years old, she is separated and has two dependent children. She makes a living selling hamburgers. Her biggest wish is to have her own premises so that her business can continue to progress.

She requested the loan to buy bread, meat, chicken, lettuce and oil. The group 'Mujeres En Acción De Fhiladelfia' is grateful to all the people who helped fund this loan.

Vanesa is the third one sitting on the right. She is wearing a pink t-shirt, white trousers and a white bag. 

Yajayra is not in the picture, because she couldn't asist to the meeting.

loans.use: to buy bread, meat, chicken, lettuce and oil

loans.name: Marina Isabel

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene 4 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, la joven vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas,  herbicidas, etc. y el pago de alquiler de parcela donde siembra ya que ella no posee terreno propio para cosechar, y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.
texts.en:
This young borrower, who's face has been blurred as she is 26 and living in a high risk area, makes her living growing corn and beans. 

She has been doing this work for four years, and she sells her products in the various markets near her home. She lives in her own home together with her two children. 

She is requesting a loan to buy supplies, such as fertilizer, compost, pest control and herbicides, as well as to pay for the rent of the plot where she grows her crops, as she does not own her own land for planting. With the loan she will be able to improve her quality of life, as well as that of her children.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fertilizer, compost, pest control and herbicides, as well as to pay for the rent of the plot of land.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia  Juana  se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de comida, la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante, la socia hace platos como pollo al horno, sopas entre otros, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su negocio de venta de comida. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar verduras, pollo y carne.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Juana, one of the members, is still selling food. This business helps her to get ahead. She prepares different dishes, such as roasted chicken and different soups. Her dream is to expand her food business.

Juana is requesting a loan to buy vegetables, chicken and beef. She is pleased with this loan and promises to pay the installments according to plan.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, chicken and beef.

loans.name: Augustin

texts.en:
Augustin is 33 years old. He is married with 4 children aged between 1 and 9 years. 2 of them go to school.

Augustin is a farmer and has been growing rice for the past 8 years, while his wife is a businesswoman. With the loan from Kiva, he would like to buy fertilizers to grow rice to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for his children and to improve his welfare

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to grow rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks, etc.

loans.name: Ruzanna

texts.en:
Ruzanna lives in the village Ddmashen of the Gegharkunik region. She lives with her son and her daughter, both of whom are unemployed now and they greatly help Ruzanna in farming and agriculture. 

Ruzanna has received a higher pedagogical education and has worked at the village school as a teacher of mathematics since 1980. Her farm work and the work at the school she combines perfectly. Now in her farm she has cows, calves, sheep, a heifer, pigs, a horse, and chickens. Her farm’s milk, other dairy-products, meat, eggs, and the vegetables that she cultivates on her plot of land (potatoes, greens, cucumbers, carrots, and tomatoes) she sells to re-sellers right from her house. 

Ruzanna needs this loan because she wants to buy a new hay mowing machine for her farm which will be useful for her farm works and her son will also take orders of hay mowing services about their village.

loans.use: to buy a new hay mowing machine.

loans.name: Carolyne's Group

texts.en:
Carolyne is 27 years old and is often described as a very friendly person. She has four children and is married. As a group leader, Carolyne is representing her group of 11 farmers in the Webuye District in Kenya and she is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Carolyne's desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Apart from receiving farming inputs, she is also purchasing a solar light as part of her loan, which is very exciting to her as she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits that she gains from this year’s harvest, she plans to buy a cow.

Carolyne and her group will receive a total of 11 solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 6.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Grupo Tocache Group

texts.es:
Francisco  es un hombre casado de 51 años vive en una comunidad denominado San Andrés Semetabaj tiene siete hijos de las edades entre 10 y 26 años de edad. 
Francisco (es el que se encuentra en medio de la fotografía de playera gris)desde ya hace varios años se dedica a la albañilería en su comunidad, con esta actividad el genera sus ingresos y con lo poco que gana mantiene a su familia con  los gastos de la casa , es una actividad que aprendió  de sus padre desde hace 20 años y es la única actividad que Francisco realiza. 
Pues él desde hace algunos días se ha dado cuenta que una de las necesidades de la familia es la remodelación de la casa, pues la casa donde ellos viven ya cuenta con muchos años por lo que se ha deteriorado poco a poco, pero para poder realizar la remodelación se necesita de una gran cantidad de dinero, por lo que francisco para conseguir el dinero ha organizado un grupo de personas para solicitar un prestamo que lo utilizara para comparar cemento, bloc, arena.

Pues una de las metas de Francisco para este año es poder remodelar su casa y que algún día sus hijos tengan una casa propia.
texts.en:
Francisco is a married man, 51, who lives in a community called San Andrés Semetabaj. He has 7 children, between the ages of 10 and 26. 

Francisco (found in the middle of the photograph wearing a gray t-shirt), has been making a living for several years as the mason in his community. With this trade, he earns his income, and what little he earns goes to supporting his family, and the household expenses. He learned this trade from his father 20 years ago, and it is the only trade that he knows.

He has been aware, for some days, that one of the needs of the family is the remodelling of the house, since the house where they live has already had many years, and has deteriorated little by little. However, in order to do the remodeling, he needs a large quantity of money. Because of this, Francisco has organized a group of people to apply for a loan to be used to buy cement, CMU, and sand. 

One of Francisco's goals is that this year he can remodel his house, and that someday, his children can have their own home.

loans.use: to buy cement, CMU, and sand for the remodel of his house.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur lives in Kapan, Syunik region and is involved in construction. He lives with his wife and 25-year-old son, who works at a local gas station. Artur has been involved in construction work for four years and is very skilled.

Aiming to improve working conditions and purchase tools and materials for construction works, he has applied for this loan. His loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This program provides business start-up loans to informal businesses that do not qualify through normal channels.

loans.use: to pay for tools and materials for providing construction service.

loans.name: Jose Maria

texts.es: A sus 51 años de edad José  es un señor casado, es de nacionalidad colombiana y son 15 años que vive en Ecuador y comenta que es tranquilo vivir en Ecuador, Jose tiene 3 hijos, 1 hijo de 31 años, una hija de 22 la otra de 25 años, la hija de 22 años esta estudiando, La esposa de Jose se dedica a trabajar en una plantación de flores, Jose se dedica a la ganadería y a la agricultura, Jose va a invertir el crédito en la compra de terneros para criarlos y al momento de venderlos tener ganancia, Jose aspira mejorar su negocio y así junto a su familia mejorar la calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José, aged 51, is a married man. He is Colombian, but he has been living in Ecuador for 15 years now. He says that life is peaceful in Ecuador. He has three children: a 31-year-old son, a 25-year-old daughter, and a 22-year-old daughter—who is currently studying. 

José's wife makes a living growing flowers, and Jose works in cattle raising and agriculture. 

José is going to use the loan to purchase calves to raise them and make a profit at the time of their sale. 

José hopes to improve his business and thus, together with his family, improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Rakesh

texts.en:
Rakesh thanks all his Kiva lenders for being so helpful.

In the previous season, he didn't make enough profits and couldn't save much, because the costs were high and the price of the paddy was very low.

But he tried to repay his entire loan on time. Now, he lacks finances and approaches us for another loan of SRD 8,000, so he can buy fertilizers and pesticides for his rice cultivation.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Hosmin Salomón

texts.es:
Hosmin vive en una comunidad de Sololá, es un hombre muy dedicado a su trabajo y le encanta su trabajo él tiene 32 años de edad  y vive muy apegado a su esposa con la que tiene 1 hijo de cuatro años.

Hosmin desde hace dos años viene trabajando para una empresa privada, él es una persona muy amable por el tipo de trabajo que realiza, es muy reconocido por la sociedad ya que todos los días se relaciona con personas de diferentes edades,  Hosmin está interesado en conseguir un préstamo, ya que lo que él requiere es construir una cocina y comprar cemento, hierro y pago de mano de obra,  para que su familia tenga un mejor lugar donde se pueda preparar los alimentos sanamente pues hasta estos días la necesidad más primordial es la  cocina. Con los ingresos que  genera de su trabajo estaría pagando el préstamo. 

Otro sueño de Hosmin es que con el trabajo que tiene, pudiera en el futuro comprar más terrenos  para darle a su hijo, Hosmin tiene esperanzas de conseguir el préstamo.
texts.en:
Hosmin lives in the community of Sololá. He is a man who is very devoted to his job and enjoys his work. Hosmin is 32 years old and lives in close harmony with his wife and their four-year-old son.

He has been working for a private company for the past two years. Hosmin is well-manned for the type of work that he does. He has been recognized by others for the way he relates every day with people of different ages.

Hosmin is interested in securing a loan because he needs to build a kitchen. He will buy cement, iron, and also pay for labor so that his family can have a better place to prepare food in a clean environment. As of late, their most fundamental need is a kitchen. With the income he earns from his job, Hosmin will be able to repay the loan.

His other wish is to buy more land in the future with the income he earns from his job. He plans to give it to his son. Hosmin is hopeful of being able to obtain this loan.

loans.use: to pay for cement, iron, and labor in order to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Nhóm 3- An Thanhv2 Group

texts.en: Mrs. Luot, 60, works in agricultural production and earns a monthly income of approximately VND 450,000. She is married with two children but both of them have an intellectual disability. She has been a member of the local Women's Union since 1975. Now, her family is in a situation of economic hardship and they don't have a sanitary toilet yet. With this loan, Luot will build a septic tank latrine to improve the family's living conditions and contribute to environmental protection. In this photo Mrs. Luot is pictured first from the right.

loans.use: To pay for the construction of a sanitary latrine with a device for handwashing with soap

loans.name: Chanuka Women Group

texts.en:
Jane (raising her hand in the photo) is a member of Chanuka Women Group. She is 38 years old, married, and has four children. Jane farms maize and beans as her main business.  She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2013. She has benefited from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa training on enterprise and financial management, which has enabled her to manage her business.

Jane is requesting a loan, which she will use to buy seeds and fertilizer that will boost her farming. This loan will help increase her income and assist her in meeting her family's needs and paying school fees.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Santos Eladio

texts.es:
Santos Eladio tiene 55 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia de material rústico junto a su cónyuge en el distrito de Buenos Aires, es un lugar donde sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral, actividad que realiza hace más de 5 años, contando con clientela fija quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El destino del crédito será para invertirlo en la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, con esto el espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos que le van a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Santos Eladio is 55 years old and has a common-law marriage. He lives in his own home made of rustic materials together with his wife in the Buenos Aires district in a place where the inhabitants work in agriculture, livestock, and trade. It is located in the Morropón province in the Piura region on the northern coast of Peru.

He works raising poultry, an activity he has been doing for more than 5 years and he has regular clients who provide very good personal and work references for him. He will use the loan to invest in the purchase of a larger number of animals as well as animal feed to fatten them. In this way he hopes to offer his customers a greater variety of animals which will generate higher earnings that will permit him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a larger number of animals as well as animal feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Lyra

texts.en:
Lyra sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan had entrenched her business. She was able to grow her funds used for her business. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs and expenses.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you will lend her an amount of 26,000 PHP. This new loan will go to more groceries and supplies she needs to increase her profit from business. An increase on profit will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Aside from growing her business, Lyra aims to become rich and successful in the future. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items, rice, canned goods, condiments and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Nimfa

texts.en:
Nimfa sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan had greatly enriched her business. She was able to buy raw materials and supplies which are needed in her business. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs and expenditures.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you will let her borrow again an amount of 8,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional materials needed in making the rugs and doormats she sells. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family through the help of this assistance.

Nimfa wants to improve her business and their present financial status. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for fabric, cloth, thread, and other materials needed in her business.

loans.name: Ghukas

texts.en:
Ghukas has been providing construction services in Stepanavan town. He provides floor and wall tiling services and housing cosmetic repair work. 

Ghukas lives with his wife and 11-year-old son. As the only breadwinner of the family, Ghukas works day and night. 

Ghukas has applied for this loan to improve the construction services he provides, and update the tools which he uses during the work. He plans to purchase tools and materials.

His loan has been approved within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. This program provides business start-up loans to informal businesses that do not qualify through normal channels.

loans.use: to pay for construction tools and materials

loans.name: Ignance

texts.en:
Ignance is 25 years old. He is a farmer and he has been growing rice for seven years, while his wife is a businesswoman. 

With the loan from Kiva, he would like to buy fertilizer to grow rice and sell it. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for his children and to improve his welfare.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to grow rice and to sell it.

loans.name: Marie Agnes

texts.en:
Marie Agnes is aged 38 years old. She is married, with two children aged 1 and 3 years; they do not yet go to school. She is a farmer and she has been growing rice for the past eight years, while her husband is a businessman. 

With the loan from Kiva, she would like to buy fertilizer for the rice. The profits from the business will be used to to improve her standards of living.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for rice.

loans.name: Mediatrice

texts.en:
Mediatrice aged 31 years. She is married, with two children aged between 1 and 3 years; they are not yet in school. She is a farmer and she has been growing rice for the past five years. Also, her husband is a farmer. 

With the loan from Kiva, she would like to buy fertilizer to grow rice and to sell it. The profits from the business will be used to make savings and buy food for home consumption.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain under served by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer to grow rice and sell it.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana Milena se dedica a la actividad comercial desde el año 2012, pues su madre le enseñó a tener su propio negoció como hasta ahora lo ha hace. En su oferta tiene ropa, calzado y artículos varios, que vende mediante guías especializadas o catálogos, a vecinos del sector donde habita, familiares y referidos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará ropa, calzado y otras variedades, con los que responderá a pedidos que le ha hecho su clientela y que aumentarán su liquidez, sus ventas y  sus utilidades, haciendo de su credikiva una inversión exitosa. Su meta es continuar logrando que las ventas se incrementen  y educar a sus hijos con un gran nivel de calidad, aunque su mayor desafío sea, el tener un capital de trabajo suficiente para alcanzar sus sueños de prosperidad.
texts.en:
Ana Milena has made a living through her business activities since the year 2012. Her mother taught her how to run her own business as she currently does. She stocks clothing, shoes and various other items that she sells through specialized guides or catalogs to neighbors in the area where she lives, relatives, and people she is referred to. 

She is presently applying for her first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. With this loan she will buy clothing, shoes and various other items which will be used to meet orders that her customers have made. This will increase her cash flow, her sales and her profits, making the Kiva loan a successful investment. Her goal is to continue to increase sales and to give her children a high quality of education, although her greatest challenge is having sufficient working capital to reach her dreams of prosperity.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes and other items.

loans.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es:
Pedro, de 41 años de edad, estudio hasta quinto grado de básica, está soltero, tiene dos hijos, de los cuales uno está acompañado y el otro hijo estudia, pero no vive con el; su mamá y su padrastro viven en su casa.

Pedro, trabaja con ganado de repasto, lo ha hecho por más de seis años y lo aprendió de su padre y también trabaja de carpintero; la distancia que camina es de 2 kilómetros, para llegar hasta donde está el ganado, uno de sus primos le ayuda con el cuido del ganado.

Pedro, necesita el crédito para comprar ganado, con esta compra, mejorará sus ingresos porque tendrá la oportunidad de venderlo en un mejor precio.

Sus sueños son, poder trabajar lo mejor que se pueda, para poder ofrecer a su hijo un mejor futuro y que se pueda preparar académicamente.
texts.en:
Pedro, 41 years old, studied until the fifth grade.  He is single and has two children, of whom one is married and the other son is in school but does not live with him.  His mother and his stepfather live in his house.  

Pedro woks with pasture cattle, which he has done for six years, and he learned it from his father and he also works as a carpenter.  He walks two kilometers to arrive to where is cattle are.  One of his cousins helps him care for the cattle.

Pedro is requesting a loan to buy cattle.  With this purchase, he will improve his profits because he will have the opportunity to sell them at a better price.

His dreams are to be able to work the best that he can to be able to offer his son a better future and be able to prepare him academically.

loans.use: To buy cattle.

loans.name: Rosa Mirian

texts.es:
Rosa, de 38 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, creció con sus padres, es madre de 2 hijos, uno de 13 y otro de 18 años de edad, está casada y su esposo está fuera del país. 

Rosa, trabaja sembrando hortalizas, este oficio lo aprendió gracias a uno de sus hermanos, que le enseño desde que ella estaba pequeña, también trabaja en la siembra de maíz. Específicamente, cultiva tomates, ejotes, pepino y maíz, todo lo hace con sistema de riego, porque hay una fuente de agua cerca a su casa y de ahí la lleva hasta sus cultivos, en los trabajos le apoyan sus dos hijos.

Rosa, solicita el crédito para comprar semilla e insumos para la siembra de cultivo de pepino y tomate, con los cuales espera obtener muy buenas cosechas, para generar ingresos económicos para su familia.

El sueño de Rosa, es poder seguir trabajando, para ayudar a sus hijos a que terminen sus estudios y sean personas de bien en la sociedad.- Además, sueña con mejorar el piso de su vivienda pues es de tierra y le gustaría ponerle ladrillo, para vivir en mejores condiciones.
texts.en:
Rosa is 38 years old and studied through the third grade. She grew up with her parents and is now the mother of two children, ages 13 and 18. Rosa is married and her husband lives outside of the country.

Rosa works by planting vegetables. She learned this trade from one of her siblings who taught her when she was young. Rosa also grows corn. More specifically, she cultivates tomatoes, green beans, cucumbers, and corn. All of these crops are produced with the help of an irrigation system because the source of water is near her house, which would require transporting it to the crops. Her two children help her with the work.

Rosa is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds and supplies for planting cucumbers and tomatoes. She hopes to obtain very good harvests that generate income for her family. Her dream is to continue working so that she can help her children finish their studies and become good people in society. In addition, she dreams of making improvements to her home by laying down brick over the dirt floor so that she and her family can live in better conditions.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies for planting cucumbers and tomatoes.

loans.name: Elizabeth's Group

texts.en:
Elizabeth is 37 years old and is often described as a very hardworking individual. She has two children and is married. As a group leader, Elizabeth is representing her group of 11 farmers in Webuye District in Kenya, and is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Elizabeth's desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Apart from receiving farming inputs, she is also purchasing a solar light as part of her loan, which is very exciting to her as she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits that she gains from this year’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

Elizabeth and her group will receive a total of 9 solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of 6.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Vincent's Group

texts.en:
Vincent is 70 years old and is often referred to as a really trustworthy person. As a group leader, he is representing his group in Webuye District, formed by 16 farmers, including himself.

Vincent has been a farmer for more than 40 years, and has worked with One Acre Fund for a while now, having joined for the first time in 2011 because he wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. 

Not only will he get maize seeds and fertilizer with his loan, but also a solar light in order to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. He decided that he will use the profits he gains from this year’s harvest to send his children to school.

With this loan, Vincent’s Group will receive a total of 10 solar lights as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 8 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Zippy's Group

texts.en:
Zippy's Group is formed by 10 farmers in Webuye District, and is being represented by Zippy, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 44 years old, is married, and has three children. Zippy has been a farmer for 15 years, and is often referred to as a very experienced farmer.

Zippy isn’t new to One Acre Fund; she actually joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed her life has changed; especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family ever since. 

This year, Zippy will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Using this loan, Zippy's Group will purchase a total of 7 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 7.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Catherine's Group

texts.en:
Catherine is a 30-year-old proud mother of five children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of 11 farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Catherine has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Catherine described her harvest as excellent last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Catherine’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6.75 acres of land and purchase a total of 6 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
The person in the photograph is Alice. She is forty-eight years old, married, and has three children. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2013 to learn and gain more experience in enterprise start-up and development. She also learnt skills in financial management, which have helped her manage her finances well.

She does maize, beans, and potato farming, which has enabled her to earn income for her family’s basic needs. She is borrowing a loan to purchase farm inputs such as hybrid seeds and fertilizer.

This will enable her to increase the crop yield; hence, have more harvest. Thus, she will meet the demand for maize and beans in her locality and improve her income; hence, be in a position to educate her children.

Alice is grateful for Kiva and their lenders for the help and support. She therefore promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: to buy hybrid seeds and fertilizer that will boost her farming.

loans.name: Jane's Group

texts.en:
Jane is a 56-year-old proud mother of seven children. She is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing her group of 10 farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2012, Jane has noticed that she has been able to consistently feed her family.

Jane described her harvest as very good last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. 

She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to rent more land to cultivate.

With this loan, Jane’s Group will be able to plant a total of 6 acres of land and purchase a total of 7 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Furqat

texts.ru: Фуркат молодой человек в возрасте 26 лет, в первые обратился в МДО «Арванд». Фуркат занимается средне масштабно-строительной работой имеет хороший опыт работа и он профессионал в своем деле. И у него очень хорошая заработная плата. Женат  имеет  1-го ребёнка. Его жена имеет среднее образование, помогает семье выходит  в поле в качестве наемной работницы. Его очень уважают соседи и родственники, потому, что он очень общительный, трудолюбивый и честный. Он хочет заменить свои окна на пластиковые но у него нет нужной суммы. Фуркат обратился в МДО Арванд за финансовой поддержкой, он надеется на сотрудничество.
texts.en: Furqat is a 26-year-old young man, who comes to MDO Arvand for the first time. Furqat is involved in medium-size construction work, has good work experience and is a professional in his field. He has a very good salary. He is married and has one child. His wife has a secondary education and helps the family by working on a field as hired help. Furqat is very respected by his neighbors and relatives because he is very sociable, hardworking and honest. He wants to replace his windows with plastic ones, but does not have the necessary sum of money. Furqat requested financial support from MDO Arvand and relies on this partnership.

loans.use: to buy and install plastic windows

loans.name: Marije

texts.en:
This is Marije and her husband, Gjon; they are parents of four. They are in the photograph.  They live in the northern part of the country and in the local language they are called ‘malesor’.

Marije does livestock as a source of income, and she is seeking your financial help of 150,000 Albanian Lek to buy four calves. Currently she’s got two dairy cows and a grown up female calf; she sells roughly 15 liters of raw milk a day and also she buys little calves, raises them and then sells them. 

In addition to this, her family owns 7,000 square meters of agricultural land where they plant mainly corn, wheat and fodder; however they sell nothing from these products since they keep it for themselves and for feeding the animals.

loans.use: to buy four little calves, to raise and then sell

loans.name: Policarpo

texts.es:
Policarpo vive en una comunidad de Sololá, tiene 70 años de edad es casado tiene una linda familia de 5 hijos de las edades de entre 20 y 34.
